# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-105">合规性中心中的数据丢失防护 (DLP) 包括许多可供您在 DLP 策略中使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-106">本主题列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-108">此外，关键字和校验和等确凿的证据可用于识别敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-110">敏感信息类型需要以下订阅之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-113">ABA 传送号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-115">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-116">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-117">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-118">以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-119">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-120">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-121">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-122">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-123">未格式化：以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-124">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-125">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-126">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-127">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-128">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-129">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- ABA Routing Number -->
<Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-149">阿根廷国家标识 (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-151">八个数字，用点分隔</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-151">Eight digits separated by periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-153">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-154">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-155">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-155">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-156">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-157">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-157">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-158">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-159">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-160">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-161">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-162">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-163">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-164">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-176">澳大利亚银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-178">具有或不具有银行状态分支号码的6到 twn 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-178">six to twn digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-180">帐号是6到10位数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-181">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-182">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-183">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-184">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-185">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-186">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-187">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-188">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-189">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-190">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-191">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-192">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-193">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-194">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-210">澳大利亚商业电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-210">Australia business number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-211">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-211">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-212">11个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-212">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-213">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-213">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-214">11个带可选分隔符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-214">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-215">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-215">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-216">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-216">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-217">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-217">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-218">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-218">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-219">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-219">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-220">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-220">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-221">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-221">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-222">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-223">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-223">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-224">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-225">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-225">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-226">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-226">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-227">找到 Keywords_australian_business_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-227">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-228">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-228">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-229">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-229">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-239">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-239">Australia company number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-240">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-241">9个带分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-241">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-242">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-242">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-243">九位数带分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-243">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-244">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-244">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-245">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-245">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-246">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-246">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-247">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-247">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-248">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-248">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-249">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-249">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-250">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-250">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-251">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-251">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-252">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-252">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-253">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-253">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-254">找到 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-254">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-255">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-255">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-256">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-256">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-266">澳大利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-266">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-267">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-267">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-268">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-268">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-269">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-269">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-270">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-270">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-271">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-271">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-272">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-272">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-273">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-273">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-274">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-274">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-275">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-275">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-276">4到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-276">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-277">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-277">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-278">9个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-278">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-279">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-279">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-280">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-280">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-281">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-281">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-282">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-282">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-283">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-283">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-284">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-284">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-285">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-285">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-385">澳大利亚医疗帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-385">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-386">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-386">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-387">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-387">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-388">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-388">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-389">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-389">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-390">第一个数字在范围2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-390">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-391">第九个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-391">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-392">第十位数字是问题位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-392">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-393">第十位数字 (可选) 是单个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-393">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-394">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-394">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-395">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-395">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-396">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-396">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-397">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-397">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-398">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-398">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-399">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-399">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-400">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-400">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-403">bank account details</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-403">bank account details</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-404">medicare payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-404">medicare payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-405">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-405">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-406">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-406">bank payments</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-407">information branch</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-407">information branch</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-412">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-412">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-413">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-413">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-414">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-414">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-415">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-415">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-416">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-416">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-417">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-417">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-418">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-418">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-419">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-419">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-420">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-420">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-421">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-421">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-422">找到 Keyword_passport 或 Keyword_australia_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-422">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-456">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-456">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-457">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-457">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-458">8到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-458">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-459">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-459">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-460">通常显示空格的八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-460">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-461">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-461">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-462">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-462">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-463">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-463">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-464">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-464">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-465">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-465">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-466">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-466">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-467">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-467">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-468">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-468">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-469">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-469">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-470">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-470">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-471">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-471">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-472">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-472">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-475">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-475">australian business number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-476">marginal tax rate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-476">marginal tax rate</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-477">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-477">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-478">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-478">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-479">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-479">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-480">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-480">withholding tax</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-481">individual tax return</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-481">individual tax return</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-482">tax file number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-482">tax file number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-483">tfn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-483">tfn</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-484">奥地利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-484">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-485">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-485">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-486">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-486">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-487">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-487">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-488">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-488">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-489">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-489">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-490">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-490">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-491">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-491">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-492">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-492">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-493">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-493">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-494">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-494">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-495">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-495">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-497">Keywords_austria_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-497">Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-507">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-507">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-508">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-508">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-512">奥地利身份卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-512">Austria identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-513">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-513">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-514">字母、数字和特殊字符的24个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-514">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-515">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-515">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-516">24个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-516">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-517">22个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-517">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-518">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-518">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-519">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-519">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-520">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-520">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-521">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-521">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-522">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-522">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-523">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-523">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-524">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-524">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-525">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-525">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-526">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-526">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-527">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-527">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-528">
national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-528">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-529">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-529">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-530">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-530">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-531">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号码 sensitiveinformation 类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-531">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-532">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-533">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-533">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-534">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-535">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-535">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-536">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-536">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-537">一个空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-537">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-538">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-538">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-539">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-539">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-540">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-540">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-541">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-541">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-542">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-542">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-543">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-543">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-544">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-544">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-545">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-545">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-546">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-546">Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-547">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-547">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-548">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-548">austrian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-549">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-549">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-550">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-550">reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-551">österreichisch reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-551">österreichisch reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-552">奥地利社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-552">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-553">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-553">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-554">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-554">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-555">以指定格式表示的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-555">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-556">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-556">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-557">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-557">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-558">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-558">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-559">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-559">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-560">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-560">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-561">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-561">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-562">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-562">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-563">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-563">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-564">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-564">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-565">函数 "Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-565">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-566">_or_equivalent "找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-566">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-567">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-567">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-568">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-568">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-569">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-569">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-585">奥地利税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-585">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-586">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-586">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-587">9个数字，带可选连字符和正斜线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-587">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-588">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-588">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-589">9个带可选连字符和正斜线的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-589">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-590">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-590">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-591">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-591">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-592">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-592">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-593">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-593">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-594">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-594">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-595">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-595">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-596">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-596">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-597">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-597">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-598">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-598">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-599">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-599">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-600">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-600">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-601">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-601">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-602">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-602">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-625">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-625">Austria value added tax</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-626">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-626">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-627">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-627">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-628">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-628">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-629">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-629">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-630">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-630">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-631">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-631">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-632">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-632">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-633">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-633">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-634">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-634">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-635">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-635">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-636">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-636">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-637">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-637">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-638">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-638">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-639">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-639">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-640">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-640">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-641">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-641">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-642">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-642">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-643">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-643">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-644">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-644">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-645">找到 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-645">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-646">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-646">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-647">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-647">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-648">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-648">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_austria_value_added_tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-649">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-649">Keyword_austria_value_added_tax</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-650">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-650">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-651">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-651">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-652">奥地利 vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-652">austrian vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-653">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-653">vat no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-654">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-654">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-655">增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-655">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-656">奥地利 vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-656">austrian vat</span></span>

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-665">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-665">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-666">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-666">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-667">字符串 "DocumentDb"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-667">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-668">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-668">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-669">字符串 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-669">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-670">介于3-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-670">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-671">大于符号 ( # A0) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-671">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-672">86小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-672">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-673">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-673">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-674">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-674">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-675">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-675">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-676">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-676">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-677">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-677">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-678">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-678">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-679">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-679">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-694">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-694">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-696">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-696">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-697">com "或" cloudapp "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-697">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-698">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-698">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-699">net "和字符串" Password "或" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-699">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-700">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-700">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-701">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-701">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-702">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-702">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-703">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-703">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-704">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-704">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-705">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-705">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-706">字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-706">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-707">com "，" cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-707">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-708">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-708">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-709">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-709">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-710">介于1-300 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-710">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-711">字符串 "Password"、"password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-711">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-712">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-712">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-713">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-713">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-714">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-714">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-715">一个或多个不是分号的字符 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-715">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-716">分号 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-716">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-717">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-717">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-718">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-718">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-719">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-719">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-720">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-720">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-721">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-721">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-722">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-722">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-737">Azure IoT 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-737">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-752">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-752">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-753">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-753">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-754">43小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-754">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-755">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-755">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-756">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-757">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-757">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-758">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-759">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-759">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-760">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-760">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-761">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-761">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-publish-setting-password"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-776">Azure 发布设置密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-776">Azure publish setting password</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-777">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-777">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-778">字符串 "userpwd ="，后跟一个字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-778">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-779">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-779">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-780">字符串 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-780">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-781">任何60小写字母或数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-781">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-782">引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-782">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-783">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-784">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-784">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-785">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-786">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-787">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-787">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-788">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-788">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-804">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-804">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-805">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-805">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-806">net "，后跟下面的模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-806">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-807">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-807">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-808">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-808">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-809">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-809">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-810">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-810">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-811">字符串 "password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-811">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-812">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-812">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-813">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-813">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-814">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-814">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-815">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-815">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-816">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-816">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-817">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-817">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-818">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-818">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-819">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-819">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-820">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-820">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-821">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-821">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-822">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-822">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-sas"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-837">Azure SA</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-837">Azure SAS</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-838">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-838">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-839">字符串 "sig"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-839">The string "sig" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-840">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-840">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-841">字符串 "sig"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-841">the string "sig"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-842">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-842">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-843">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-843">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-844">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-844">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-845">介于43-53 个字符和小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-845">any combination of between 43-53 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, or the percent sign (%)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-846">字符串 "% 3d"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-846">the string "%3d"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-847">不是字母或数字的小写字母、数字或百分号 (% ) 的任意字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-847">any character that is not a lower- or uppercase letter, digit, or percent sign (%)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-848">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-848">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-849">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-849">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-850">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-850">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-851">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-851">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-852">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureSAS 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-852">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureSAS finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="4d235014-e564-47f4-a6fb-6ebb4a826834" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureSAS" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
