- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-861">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-861">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-862">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-862">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-863">字符串 "</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-863">the string "servicebus.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-864">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-864">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-865">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-865">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-866">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-866">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-867">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-867">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-868">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-868">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-869">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-869">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-870">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-870">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-871">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-871">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-872">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-873">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-873">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-874">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-875">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-875">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-876">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-876">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-877">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-877">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Service Bus Connection String-->
<Entity id="b9a6578f-a83f-4fcd-bf44-2130bae49a6f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureServiceBusConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-892">Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-892">Azure storage account key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-893">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-893">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-894">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "AccountKey"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-894">The string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "AccountKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-895">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-895">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-896">字符串 "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-896">the string "DefaultEndpointsProtocol"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-897">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-897">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-898">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-898">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-899">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-899">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-900">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-900">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-901">字符串 "AccountKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-901">the string "AccountKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-902">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-902">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-903">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-903">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-904">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-904">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-905">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-905">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-906">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-906">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-907">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-907">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-908">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-908">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-909">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-909">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-910">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-910">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-911">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-911">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-912">正则表达式 **CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-912">The regular expression CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-913">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-913">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key-->
<Entity id="c7bc98e8-551a-4c35-a92d-d2c8cda714a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_AzureEmulatorStorageAccountFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-919"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-919">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

## <a name="azure-storage-account-key-generic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-931"> (通用) 的 Azure 存储帐户密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-931">Azure Storage account key (generic)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-932">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-932">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-933">86的任意组合（以小写或大写字母、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) ，在下面的模式中所列字符的前面或后面）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-933">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+), preceded or followed by the characters outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-934">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-934">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-935">0到大于号之一 ( # A0) 、撇号 ( ' ) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或数字标记 ( # ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-935">zero to one of the greater than symbol (>), apostrophe ('), equal sign (=), quotation mark ("), or number sign (#)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-936">86个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-936">any combination of 86 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, the forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-937">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-937">two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-938">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-938">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-939">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-939">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-940">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-940">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-941">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-941">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-942">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-942">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Storage Account Key (Generic)-->
<Entity id="7ff41bd0-5419-4523-91d6-383b3a37f084" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureStorageAccountKeyGeneric" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
## <a name="belgium-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-943">比利时驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-943">Belgium driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-944">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-944">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-945">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-945">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-946">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-946">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-947">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-947">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-948">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-948">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-949">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-949">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-950">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-950">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-951">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-951">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-952">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-952">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-953">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-953">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-954">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-954">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-955">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-955">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-956">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-956">**Keywords__belgium_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-national-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-976">比利时国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-976">Belgium national number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-977">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-978">11位数加上可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-978">11 digits plus optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-979">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-980">11 个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-980">11 digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-981">6个数字和两个可选句点（以 YY 为格式）。月.DD 出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-981">six digits and two optional periods in the format YY.MM.DD for date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-982">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-982">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-983">奇数的三个连续数字 (奇数，即使偶数) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-983">three sequential digits (odd for males, even for females)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-984">点、短划线、空间中的可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-984">An optional delimiter from dot, dash, space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-985">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-985">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-986">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-986">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-987">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-987">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-988">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-988">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-989">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-989">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-990">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-990">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-991">找到 Keyword_belgium_national_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-991">A keyword from Keyword_belgium_national_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-992">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-992">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-993">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-993">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-994">函数 Func_belgium_national_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-994">The function Func_belgium_national_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-995">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-995">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Belgium National Number -->
       <Entity id="fb969c9e-0fd1-4b18-8091-a2123c5e6a54" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_national_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1054">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1054">Belgium passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1055">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1055">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1056">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1056">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1057">两个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1057">two letters followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1058">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1058">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1059">两个字母，后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1059">two letters and followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1060">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1061">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1061">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1062">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1063">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1063">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1064">正则表达式  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1064">The regular expression  `Regex_belgium_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1065">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1065">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_belgium__eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1066">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1066">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1067">Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1067">Keywords_belgium_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1068">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1068">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1069">比利时护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1069">belgian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1070">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1070">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1071">paspoort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1071">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1072">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1072">paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1073">reisepass kein</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1073">reisepass kein</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1074">reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1074">reisepass</span></span>

## <a name="belgium-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1075">比利时社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1075">Belgium social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1076">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1076">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1077">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1077">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1078">11位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1078">11 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1079">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1079">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1080">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1080">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1081">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1082">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1082">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1083">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1084">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1084">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1085">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1085">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1086">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1086">A keyword from  `Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1087">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1087">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1088">函数  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1088">The function  `Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="belgium-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1108">比利时增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1108">Belgium value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1109">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1109">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1110">12个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1110">12-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1111">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1111">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1112">12个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1112">12-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1113">字母 B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1113">a letter B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1114">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1114">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1115">数字0</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1115">a digit 0</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1116">一个从1到9的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1116">a digit from 1 to 9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1117">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1117">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1118">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1118">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1119">一个可选的点或连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1119">an optional dot or Hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1120">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1120">four digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1121">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1121">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1122">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1122">Yes</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1123">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1123">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1124">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1124">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1125">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1125">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1126">找到 Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1126">A keyword from Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1127">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1128">函数 Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1128">The function Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Belgium Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="85b5b3c3-f2de-4ae8-ac46-fd3cb38bf9ed" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_belgium_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1129">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1129">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1130">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1130">Keyword_belgium_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1133">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1133">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1134">numéro。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1134">numéro t.v.a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1135">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1135">umsatzsteuer-identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1136">umsatzsteuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1136">umsatzsteuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1137">btw</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1137">btw</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1138">btw#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1138">btw#</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-cpf-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1140">巴西 CPF 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1140">Brazil CPF number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1141">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1142">11 个数字（包括校验位），可以格式化，也可以非格式化</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1142">11 digits that include a check digit and can be formatted or unformatted</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1143">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1144">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1144">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1145">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1145">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1146">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1146">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1147">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1147">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1148">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1148">a period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1149">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1149">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1150">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1150">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1151">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1151">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1152">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1152">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1153">11 个数字，其中最后两个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1153">11 digits where the last two digits are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1154">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1155">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1155">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1156">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1157">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1157">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1158">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1158">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1159">找到 Keyword_brazil_cpf 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1159">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cpf is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1160">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1160">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1161">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1161">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1162">函数 Func_brazil_cpf 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1162">The function Func_brazil_cpf finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1163">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1163">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil CPF Number -->
<Entity id="78e09124-f2c3-4656-b32a-c1a132cd2711" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cpf"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1164">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1164">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_cpf"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1165">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1165">Keyword_brazil_cpf</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1166">CPF</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1166">CPF</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1168">Registration</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1168">Registration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1169">营业</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1169">Revenue</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1170">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1170">Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1171">Imposto</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1171">Imposto</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1172">Identificação</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1172">Identificação</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1173">Inscrição</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1173">Inscrição</span></span>

## <a name="brazil-legal-entity-number-cnpj"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1175">巴西法人编号 (CNPJ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1175">Brazil legal entity number (CNPJ)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1176">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1176">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1177">14 个数字（包括注册号、分行号码和校验位），再加上分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1177">14 digits that include a registration number, branch number, and check digits, plus delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1178">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1178">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1179">14 个数字，再加上分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1179">14 digits, plus delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1180">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1180">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1181">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1181">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1182">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1183">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1183">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1184">三个数字 (这些前八位数字是注册号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1184">three digits (these first eight digits are the registration number)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1185">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1185">a forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1186">四位数的分支号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1186">four-digit branch number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1187">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1187">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1188">两个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1188">two digits which are check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1189">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1189">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1190">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1190">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1191">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1191">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1192">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1192">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1193">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1193">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1194">找到 Keyword_brazil_cnpj 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1194">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_cnpj is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1195">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1195">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1196">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1196">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1197">函数 Func_brazil_cnpj 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1197">The function Func_brazil_cnpj finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1198">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1198">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil Legal Entity Number (CNPJ) -->
<Entity id="9b58b5cd-5e90-4df6-b34f-1ebcc88ceae4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_cnpj"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="brazil-national-identification-card-rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1220">巴西国家标识卡 (RG) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1220">Brazil national identification card (RG)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1221">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1222">Registro Geral (旧格式) ：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1222">Registro Geral (old format): Nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1223">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：11个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1223">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format): 11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1224">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1224">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1225">Registro Geral（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1225">Registro Geral (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1226">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1226">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1227">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1227">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1228">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1228">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1229">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1229">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1230">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1230">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1231">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1231">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1232">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1232">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1233">Registro de Identidade (RIC)  (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1233">Registro de Identidade (RIC) (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1234">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1234">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1235">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1235">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1236">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1236">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1237">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1237">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1238">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1238">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1239">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1239">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1240">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1240">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1241">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1241">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1242">找到 Keyword_brazil_rg 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1242">A keyword from Keyword_brazil_rg is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1243">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1243">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1244">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1244">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1245">函数 Func_brazil_rg 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1245">The function Func_brazil_rg finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1246">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1246">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Brazil National ID Card (RG) -->
<Entity id="486de900-db70-41b3-a886-abdf25af119c" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_brazil_rg"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1247">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1247">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_brazil_rg"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1248">Keyword_brazil_rg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1248">Keyword_brazil_rg</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1249">Cédula de identidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1249">Cédula de identidade</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1250">identity card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1250">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1251">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1251">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1252">número de rregistro</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1252">número de rregistro</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1253">registro de Iidentidade</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1253">registro de Iidentidade</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1254">registro geral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1254">registro geral</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1255">RG（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1255">RG (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1256">RIC（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1256">RIC (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span> 


## <a name="bulgaria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1257">保加利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1257">Bulgaria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1258">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1258">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1259">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1259">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1260">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1260">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1261">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1261">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1262">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1262">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1263">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1263">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1264">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1264">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1265">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1265">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1266">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1267">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1267">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1268">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1268">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
             <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern> 
</Entity>    
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1284">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1284">свидетелство за управление на моторно превозно средство</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1285">сумпс</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1285">сумпс</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1286">шофьорска книжка</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1286">шофьорска книжка</span></span>


## <a name="bulgaria-uniform-civil-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1287">保加利亚统一民事号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1287">Bulgaria uniform civil number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1288">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1289">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1289">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1290">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1291">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1291">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1292">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1292">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1293">与出生顺序对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1293">two digits that correspond to the birth order</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1294">与性别对应的一位数字：男的偶数位和用于女的奇数位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1294">one digit that corresponds to gender: An even digit for male and an odd digit for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1295">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1295">one check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1296">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1297">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1297">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1298">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1299">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1300">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1300">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1301">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1301">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1302">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1303">函数  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1303">The function  `Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Bulgaria Uniform Civil Number -->
      <Entity id="100d58b1-0a35-4fb1-aa89-e4a86fb53fcc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_bulgaria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="bulgaria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1348">保加利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1348">Bulgaria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1349">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1349">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1350">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1351">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1351">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1352">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1352">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1353">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1353">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1354">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1354">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1355">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1355">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1356">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1356">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1357">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1357">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1358">正则表达式  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1358">The regular expression  `Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1359">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1359">A keyword from  `Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1360">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1360">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1361">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1361">Keywords_bulgaria_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1362">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1362">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1363">保加利亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1363">bulgarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1364">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1364">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1365">номер на паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1365">номер на паспорта</span></span>


## <a name="canada-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1366">加拿大银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1366">Canada bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1367">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1368">七个或十二个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1368">seven or twelve digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1369">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1370">加拿大银行帐号是七个或十二个数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1370">A Canada Bank Account Number is seven or twelve digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1371">加拿大银行帐户的银行代号是：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1371">A Canada bank account transit number is:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1372">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1372">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1373">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1373">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1374">三位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1374">three digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1375">零 "0"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1375">a zero "0"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1376">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1376">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1377">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1377">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1378">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1378">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1379">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1379">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1380">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1380">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1381">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1381">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1382">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1382">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1383">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1383">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_transit_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1384">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1384">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1385">正则表达式 Regex_canada_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1385">The regular expression Regex_canada_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1386">找到 Keyword_canada_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1386">A keyword from Keyword_canada_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="552e814c-cb50-4d94-bbaa-bb1d1ffb34de" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_bank_account_number" />
```

## <a name="canada-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1410">加拿大驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1410">Canada driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1412">因省而异</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1412">Varies by province</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1413">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1414">各种模式，涵盖艾伯塔、 不列颠哥伦比亚、 马尼托巴、 新不伦瑞克、 纽芬兰/拉布拉多、 新斯科舍、 安大略、 爱德华王子岛，魁北克和萨斯喀彻温</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1414">Various patterns covering Alberta, British Columbia, Manitoba, New Brunswick, Newfoundland/Labrador, Nova Scotia, Ontario, Prince Edward Island, Quebec, and Saskatchewan</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1416">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1416">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1418">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1419">函数 Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1419">The function Func_[province_name]_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1420">找到 Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1420">A keyword from Keyword_[province_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1421">找到 Keyword_canada_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1421">A keyword from Keyword_canada_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="37186abb-8e48-4800-ad3c-e3d1610b3db0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
```

## <a name="canada-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1557">加拿大运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1557">Canada health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1558">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1558">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1559">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1559">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1560">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1560">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1561">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1561">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1562">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1562">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1563">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1563">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1564">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1564">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1565">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1565">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1566">正则表达式 Regex_canada_health_service_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1566">The regular expression Regex_canada_health_service_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1567">找到 Keyword_canada_health_service_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1567">A keyword from Keyword_canada_health_service_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Health Service Number -->
<Entity id="59c0bf39-7fab-482c-af25-00faa4384c94" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_health_service_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_health_service_number" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1568">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1568">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_canada_health_service_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1569">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1569">Keyword_canada_health_service_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1570">personal health number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1570">personal health number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1571">patient information</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1571">patient information</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1572">health services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1572">health services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1573">speciality services</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1573">speciality services</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1574">automobile accident</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1574">automobile accident</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1575">patient hospital</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1575">patient hospital</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1576">psychiatrist</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1576">psychiatrist</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1577">workers compensation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1577">workers compensation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1578">障碍</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1578">disability</span></span>

      
## <a name="canada-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1579">加拿大护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1579">Canada passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1580">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1580">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1581">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1581">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1582">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1582">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1583">两个大写字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1583">two uppercase letters followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1584">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1585">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1585">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1586">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1587">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1588">正则表达式 Regex_canada_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1588">The regular expression Regex_canada_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1589">找到 Keyword_canada_passport_number 或 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1589">A keyword from Keyword_canada_passport_number or Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml 
<!-- Canada Passport Number -->
<Entity id="14d0db8b-498a-43ed-9fca-f6097ae687eb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1590">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1590">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="canada-personal-health-identification-number-phin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1619">加拿大个人健康标识号 (PHIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1619">Canada personal health identification number (PHIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1620">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1620">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1621">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1621">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1622">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1622">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1623">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1623">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1624">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1625">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1625">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1626">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1627">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1627">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1628">正则表达式 Regex_canada_phin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1628">The regular expression Regex_canada_phin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1629">找到 Keyword_canada_phin 或 Keyword_canada_provinces 中至少有两个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1629">At least two keywords from Keyword_canada_phin or Keyword_canada_provinces are found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada PHIN -->
<Entity id="722e12ac-c89a-4ec8-a1b7-fea3469f89db" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_canada_phin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_phin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_canada_provinces" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
