## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1662">加拿大社会保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1662">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1663">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1664">9个数字，带可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1664">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1665">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1666">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1666">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1667">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1667">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1668">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1668">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1669">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1669">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1670">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1670">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1671">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1671">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1672">未格式化：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1672">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1673">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1673">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1674">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1674">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1675">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1675">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1676">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1676">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1677">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1677">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1678">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1678">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1679">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1679">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1680">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1680">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1681">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1681">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1682">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1682">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1683">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1683">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1684">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1684">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1685">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1685">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1686">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1686">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1687">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1687">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1688">Keyword_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1688">Keyword_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1689">sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1689">sin</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1690">social insurance</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1690">social insurance</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1691">numero d'assurance sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1691">numero d'assurance sociale</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1692">罪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1692">sins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1693">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1693">ssn</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1694">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1694">ssns</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1695">social security</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1695">social security</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1696">numero d'assurance social</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1696">numero d'assurance social</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1697">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1697">national identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1698">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1698">national id</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1699">sin#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1699">sin#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1700">soc ins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1700">soc ins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1701">social ins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1701">social ins</span></span> 

#### <a name="keyword_sin_collaborative"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1702">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1702">Keyword_sin_collaborative</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1703">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1703">driver's license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1704">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1704">drivers license</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1705">driver's licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1705">driver's licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1706">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1706">drivers licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1707">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1707">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1708">出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1708">Birthdate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1709">Birthday</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1709">Birthday</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1710">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1710">Date of Birth</span></span> 

   
## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1711">智利标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1711">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1712">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1712">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1713">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个校验位或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1713">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1714">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1714">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1715">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1715">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1716">一到两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1716">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1717">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1717">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1718">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1718">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1719">一个句点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1719">a period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1720">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1720">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1721">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1721">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1722">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 这是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1722">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1723">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1724">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1724">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1725">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1726">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1727">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1727">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1728">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1728">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1729">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1729">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1730">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1730">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1731">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1731">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1732">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1732">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1747">中国居民身份卡片 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1747">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1748">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1748">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1749">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1749">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1750">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1751">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1751">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1752">6个数字，这是一个地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1752">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1753">8位数，形式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1753">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1754">三个数字，这是一个订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1754">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1755">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1755">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1756">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1757">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1757">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1758">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1759">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1759">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1760">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1760">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1761">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1761">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1762">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1762">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1763">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1763">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1764">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1764">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1765">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1765">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1766">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1766">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1767">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1767">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1768">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1768">Resident Identity Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1770">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1770">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1771">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1771">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1772">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1772">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1773">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1773">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1774">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1774">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1775">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1775">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1776">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1776">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1777">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1777">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1778">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1778">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1779">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1779">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1780">14到16个数字，可以设置格式或无格式 (dddddddddddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1780">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1781">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1781">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1782">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1782">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1783">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1783">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1784">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1784">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1785">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1785">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1786">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1786">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1787">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1787">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1788">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1788">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1789">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1789">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1790">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1790">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1791">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1791">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1792">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1792">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1793">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1793">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1794">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1794">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-1795">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-1795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2055">克罗地亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2055">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2056">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2056">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2057">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2057">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2058">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2058">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2059">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2059">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2060">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2060">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2061">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2061">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2062">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2062">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2063">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2063">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2064">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2064">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2065">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2065">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2066">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2066">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2067">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2067">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2068">Keywords_croatia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2068">Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2069">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2069">dl#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2071">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2071">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2072">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2072">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2073">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2073">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2074">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2074">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2075">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2075">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2076">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2076">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2077">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2077">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2078">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2078">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2079">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2079">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2080">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2080">dlno#</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2082">克罗地亚 identity 卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2082">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2083">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2083">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2084">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2084">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2085">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2085">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2086">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2086">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2087">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2087">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2088">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2088">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2089">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2089">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2090">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2090">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2091">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2091">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2092">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2092">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2093">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2093">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2124">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2124">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2125">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2125">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2126">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2126">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2127">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2127">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2128">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2128">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2129">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2129">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2130">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2130">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2131">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2131">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2132">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2132">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2133">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2133">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2134">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2134">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2135">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2135">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2136">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2136">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2137">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2137">Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2138">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2138">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2139">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2139">croatian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2140">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2140">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2141">broj putovnice</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2141">broj putovnice</span></span>

   
## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2142">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2142">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2143">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2143">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2144">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2144">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2145">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2145">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2146">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2146">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2147">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2147">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2148">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2148">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2149">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2149">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2150">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2150">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2151">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2151">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2152">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2152">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2153">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2153">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2154">找到 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2154">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2155">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2155">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2156">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2156">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2157">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2157">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2158">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2158">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2189">克罗地亚社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2189">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2190">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2190">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2191">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2191">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2192">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2192">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2193">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2193">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2194">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2194">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2195">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2195">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2196">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2196">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2197">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2197">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2198">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2198">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2199">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2199">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2200">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2200">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2201">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2201">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2202">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2202">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2203">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2203">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2204">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2204">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2221">塞浦路斯驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2221">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2222">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2222">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2223">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2223">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2224">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2224">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2225">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2225">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2226">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2226">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2227">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2227">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2228">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2228">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2229">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2229">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2230">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2230">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2231">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2231">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2232">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2232">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2239">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2239">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2240">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2240">drivers license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2243">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2243">driver's licence number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2247">塞浦路斯标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2247">Cyprus identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2248">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2248">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2249">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2249">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2250">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2250">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2251">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2251">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2252">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2252">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2253">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2253">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2254">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2254">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2255">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2255">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2256">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2256">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2257">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2257">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2258">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2258">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2259">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2259">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2260">id 卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2260">id card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2261">标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2261">identity card number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2263">国家/地区标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2263">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2264">个人 id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2264">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2265">ταυτοτητασ</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2265">ταυτοτητασ</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2266">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2266">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2267">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2267">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2268">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2268">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2269">一个字母后跟6-8 个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2269">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2270">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2270">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2271">一个字母后跟6到8个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2271">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2272">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2272">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2273">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2273">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2274">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2274">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2275">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2275">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2276">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2276">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2277">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2277">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2278">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2278">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2279">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2279">Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2280">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2280">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2281">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2281">cyprus passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2282">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2282">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2283">αριθμό διαβατηρίου</span></span>


## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2284">塞浦路斯税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2284">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2286">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2286">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2288">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2288">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2289">"0" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2289">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2290">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2290">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2291">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2291">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2292">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2292">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2293">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2293">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2294">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2294">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2295">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2295">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2296">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2296">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2297">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2297">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2298">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2298">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2299">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2299">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2327">捷克语驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2327">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2328">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2328">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2330">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2330">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2332">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2332">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2333">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2333">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2334">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2334">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2335">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2335">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2336">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2337">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2337">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2338">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2339">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2340">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2340">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2341">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2341">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2358">捷克语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2358">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2359">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2359">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2360">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2360">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2361">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2361">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2362">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2362">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2363">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2363">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2364">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2364">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2365">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2365">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2366">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2366">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2367">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2367">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2368">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2368">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2369">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2369">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2370">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2370">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2371">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2371">Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2374">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2374">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2376">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2376">pas</span></span>


## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2377">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2377">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2378">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2378">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2379">9个数字，带可选的正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，可选的正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2379">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2380">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2380">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2381"> (旧格式) 的9个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2381">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2382">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2382">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2383">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2383">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2384">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2384">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2385">10个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2385">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2386">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2386">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2387">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2387">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2388">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2388">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2389">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2389">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2390">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2390">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2391">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2391">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2392">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2392">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2393">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2393">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2394">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2394">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2395">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2395">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2396">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2396">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2397">函数 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2397">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2398">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2398">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2399">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2399">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_czech_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2400">Keyword_czech_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2400">Keyword_czech_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2445">捷克社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2445">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2446">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2446">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2448">指定模式中的10个数字和一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2448">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2450">10个数字和一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2450">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2451">与出生日期对应的6个数字 (YYMMDD) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2451">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2452">反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2452">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2453">与一个序列号相对应的三个数字，用于分隔出生于同一日期的人员</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2453">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2454">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2454">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2455">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2455">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2456">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2456">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2457">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2457">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2458">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2458">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2459">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2459">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2460">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2460">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2461">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2461">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2462">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2462">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2478">丹麦驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2478">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2479">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2479">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2480">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2480">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2481">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2481">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2482">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2482">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2483">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2483">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2484">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2484">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2485">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2485">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2486">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2486">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2487">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2487">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2488">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2488">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2489">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2489">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2506">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2506">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2507">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2507">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2508">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2508">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2509">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2509">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2510">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2510">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2511">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2511">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2512">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2512">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2513">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2513">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2514">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2514">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2515">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2515">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2516">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2516">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2517">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2517">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2518">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2518">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2519">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2519">Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2520">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2520">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2521">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2521">danish passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2522">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2522">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2523">pas</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2523">pas</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2524">pasnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2524">pasnummer</span></span>


## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2525">丹麦个人身份号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2525">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2526">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2526">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2527">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2527">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2528">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2528">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2529">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2529">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2530">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2530">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2531">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2531">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2532">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2532">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2533">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2533">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2534">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2534">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2535">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2535">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2536">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2536">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2537">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2537">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2538">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2538">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2539">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2539">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2540">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2540">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2541">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2541">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2542">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2542">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2543">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2543">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
