## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2615">丹麦社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2615">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2616">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2616">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2617">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2617">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2618">指定模式中的10个数字和一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2618">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2619">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2619">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2620">10个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2620">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2621">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2621">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2622">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2622">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2623">与序列号对应的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2623">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2624">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2624">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2625">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2625">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2626">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2626">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2627">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2627">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2628">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2628">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2629">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2629">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2630">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2630">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2631">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2631">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2632">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2632">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2633">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2633">Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2634">个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2634">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2635">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2635">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2636">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2636">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2637">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2637">nationalnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2638">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2638">ssn#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2639">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2639">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2640">国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2640">national number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2644">personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2644">personnummer</span></span>


## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2645">药品实施代理 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2645">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2646">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2646">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2647">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2647">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2648">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2648">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2649">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2649">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2650">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 这组可能的字母： abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是注册人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2650">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2651">一个字母 (不区分大小写) （注册人姓氏的第一个字母）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2651">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2652">七位数字，最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2652">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2653">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2653">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2654">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2654">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2655">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2655">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2656">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2656">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2657">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2657">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2658">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2658">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- DEA Number -->
<Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2659">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2659">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2660">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2660">none</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2661">爱沙尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2661">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2662">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2662">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2663">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2663">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2664">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2664">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2665">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2665">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2666">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2666">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2667">字母 "ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2667">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2668">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2668">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2669">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2669">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2670">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2670">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2671">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2671">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2672">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2672">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2673">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2673">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2674">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2674">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2675">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2675">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2676">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2676">Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2677">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2677">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2678">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2678">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2679">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2679">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2680">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2680">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2681">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2681">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2682">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2682">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2683">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2683">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2684">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2684">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2685">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2685">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2686">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2686">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2687">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2687">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2688">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2688">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2689">permis de conduire</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2689">permis de conduire</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-personal-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2690">爱沙尼亚个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2690">Estonia Personal Identification Code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2691">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2691">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2692">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2692">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2693">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2693">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2694">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2694">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2695">一种数字，对应于性别和出生世纪 (奇数号码男，甚至是女号码，等等。1-2：19世纪;3-4：20世纪;5-6：21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2695">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2696">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2696">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2697">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2697">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2698">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2698">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2699">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2699">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2700">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2700">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2701">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2701">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2702">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2702">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2703">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2703">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2704">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2704">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2705">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2705">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2706">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2706">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2707">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2707">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2708">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2708">Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2709">id-kaart</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2709">id-kaart</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2717">国家/地区号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2717">national number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2718">个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2718">personal code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2719">个人 id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2719">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2720">个人标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2720">personal identification code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2721">个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2721">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2722">personalidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2722">personalidnumber#</span></span>

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2739">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2739">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2740">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2740">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2741">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2741">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2742">一个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2742">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2743">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2743">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2744">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2744">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2745">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2745">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2746">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2746">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2747">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2747">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2748">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2748">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2749">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2749">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2750">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2750">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2751">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2751">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2752">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2752">Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2753">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2753">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2754">爱沙尼亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2754">estonian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2755">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2755">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2756">eesti kodaniku pass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2756">eesti kodaniku pass</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2757">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2757">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2758">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2758">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2759">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2759">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2760">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2760">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2761">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2761">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2762">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2762">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2763">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2763">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2764">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2764">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2765">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2765">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2766">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2766">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2767">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2767">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2768">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2768">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2769">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2769">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2770">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2770">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2771">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2771">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2772">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2772">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-2773">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-2773">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3219">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3219">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3220">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3220">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3221">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3221">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3222">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3222">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3223">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3223">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3224">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3224">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3225">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3225">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3226">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3226">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3227">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3227">four digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3229">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3229">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3231">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3232">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3232">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3233">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3233">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3234">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3234">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_finland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3235">Keywords_finland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3235">Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3236">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3236">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3237">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3237">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3238">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3238">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3239">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3239">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3240">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3240">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3241">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3241">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3242">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3242">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3243">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3243">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3244">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3244">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3245">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3245">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3246">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3246">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3247">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3247">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3248">ajokortti</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3248">ajokortti</span></span>


## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3249">芬兰欧洲健康保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3249">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3250">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3250">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3251">20位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3251">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3252">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3252">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3253">20位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3253">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3254">10位数-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3254">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3255">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3255">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3256">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3256">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3257">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3257">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3258">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3258">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3259">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3259">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3260">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3260">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3261">正则表达式 Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3261">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3262">找到 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3262">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3263">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3263">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3264">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3264">Keyword_finland_european_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3268">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3268">finska sjukförsäkringskort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3269">运行状况卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3269">health card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3271">健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3271">health insurance number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3272">hälsokort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3272">hälsokort</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3275">sairausvakuutusnumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3275">sairausvakuutusnumero</span></span>

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3280">芬兰国家/地区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3280">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3281">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3281">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3282">6个数字加上一个字符，表示一个世纪加上三个数字加上校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3282">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3283">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3283">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3284">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3284">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3285">6位数，格式格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3285">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3286">世纪标记 (是 "-"、"+" 或 "a" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3286">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3287">三位数的个人标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3287">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3288">不区分大小写的数字或字母 () 是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3288">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3289">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3290">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3290">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3291">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3292">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3292">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3293">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3293">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3294">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3294">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3295">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3295">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3296">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3296">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3297">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3297">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3298">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3298">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3299">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3299">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3304">henkilötunnusnumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3304">henkilötunnusnumero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3305">hetu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3305">hetu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3306">id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3306">id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3307">id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3307">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3308">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3308">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3309">identiteetti numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3309">identiteetti numero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3310">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3310">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3311">idnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3311">idnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3312">kansallinen henkilötunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3312">kansallinen henkilötunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3313">kansallisen henkilökortin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3313">kansallisen henkilökortin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3314">国家/地区 id 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3314">national id card</span></span>

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3347">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3347">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3348">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3348">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3349">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3349">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3350">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3350">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3351">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3351">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3352">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3352">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3353">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3353">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3354">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3354">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3355">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3356">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3356">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3357">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3358">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3358">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3359">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3359">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3360">找到 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3360">A keyword from Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3361">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3361">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3362">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3362">Keyword_finland_passport_number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3363">登记卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3363">Passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3364">Passi</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3364">Passi</span></span>


## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3365">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3365">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3366">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3366">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3367">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3368">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3368">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3369">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3370">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3370">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3371">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3371">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3372">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3372">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3373">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3373">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3374">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3374">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3375">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3375">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3376">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3376">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3377">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3377">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3378">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3378">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3379">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3379">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3380">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3380">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3381">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3381">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3382">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3382">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3383">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3383">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3384">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3384">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3385">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3385">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3395">国家/地区 id 编号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3395">national id no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3396">国家/地区 id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3396">national id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3397">id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3397">id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3398">tunnistenumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3398">tunnistenumero</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3400">yksilöllinen henkilökohtainen tunnistenumero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3400">yksilöllinen henkilökohtainen tunnistenumero</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3401">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3401">ainutlaatuinen henkilökohtainen tunnus</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3402">identiteetti numero</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3402">identiteetti numero</span></span>

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3409">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3409">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3410">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3410">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3412">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3412">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3413">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3414">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3414">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3416">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3416">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3418">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3418">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3419">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3419">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3420">至少满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3420">at least one of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3421">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3421">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3422">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3422">the function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3434">法国健康保险号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3434">France health insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3435">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3435">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3436">21位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3436">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3437">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3437">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3438">21位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3438">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3439">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3439">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3440">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3440">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3441">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3441">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3442">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3442">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3443">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3443">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3444">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3444">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3445">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3445">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3446">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3446">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3447">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3447">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3448">正则表达式 Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3448">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3449">找到 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3449">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3450">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3450">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3451">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3451">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3452">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3452">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3453">vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3453">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3454">d'assuré社交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3454">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3455">法国国家 id 卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3455">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3456">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3456">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3457">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3457">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3458">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3458">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3459">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3459">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3460">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3461">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3461">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3462">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3463">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3463">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3464">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3464">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3465">找到 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3465">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3467">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3467">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3479">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3479">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3480">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3480">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3481">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3482">9个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3482">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3483">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3484">9个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3484">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3485">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3485">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3486">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3486">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3487">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3487">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3488">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3488">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3489">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3489">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3490">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3490">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3491">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3491">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3492">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3492">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3493">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3493">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3503">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3503">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3504">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3504">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3505">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3505">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3506">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3506">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3507">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3507">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3508">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3508">Passeport n °</span></span>

## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3514">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3514">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3515">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3515">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3516">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3516">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3517">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3517">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3518">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3518">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3519">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3519">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3520">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3520">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3521">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3521">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3522">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3522">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3523">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3523">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3524">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3524">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3525">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3525">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3526">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3526">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3527">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3527">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3528">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3528">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3529">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3529">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3530">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3530">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3531">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3531">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3532">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3532">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3533">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3533">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3559">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3559">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3560">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3561">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3561">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3562">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3563">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3563">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3564">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3564">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3565">1位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3565">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3566">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3566">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3567">2位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3567">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3568">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3568">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3569">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3569">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3570">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3570">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3571">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3571">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3572">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3572">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3573">3个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3573">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3574">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3574">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3575">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3575">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3576">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3576">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3577">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3577">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3578">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3578">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3579">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3579">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3580">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3580">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3581">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3581">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3586">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3586">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3587">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3587">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3588">免税#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3588">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3589">免税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3589">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3590">税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3590">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3591">税务登记编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3591">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3592">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3592">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3593">taxidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3593">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3594">taxidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3594">taxidnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3595">taxno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3595">taxno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3596">taxnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3596">taxnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3597">taxnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3597">taxnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3598">纳税人 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3598">tin id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3599">tin 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3599">tin no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3600">锡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3600">tin#</span></span>


## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3601">法国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3601">France value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3602">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3602">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3603">13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3603">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3604">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3604">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3605">13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3605">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3606">两个字母-FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3606">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3607">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3607">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3608">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3608">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3609">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3609">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3610">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3610">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3611">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3611">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3612">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3612">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3613">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3613">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3614">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3614">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3615">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3615">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3616">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3616">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3617">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3617">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3618">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3618">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3619">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3619">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3620">找到 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3620">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3621">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3621">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3622">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3622">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3623">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3623">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3624">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3624">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3629">siren 标识无 numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3629">siren identification no numéro d'identification taxe sur valeur ajoutée</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3630">taxe valeur ajoutée</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3630">taxe valeur ajoutée</span></span>
