- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3634">numéro d'identification siren</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3634">numéro d'identification siren</span></span>


## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3635">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3635">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3636">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3636">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3637">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3637">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3638">11个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3638">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3639">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3639">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3640">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3640">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3641">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3641">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3642">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3642">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3643">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3643">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3644">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3644">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3645">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3645">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3646">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3646">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3647">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3647">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3648">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3648">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3649">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3649">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3650">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3650">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3651">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3651">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3652">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3652">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3653">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3653">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3654">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3654">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3655">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3655">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3748">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3748">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3749">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3749">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3750">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3750">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3751">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3751">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3752">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3752">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3753">自2010年11月1日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3753">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3754">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3754">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3755">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3755">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3756">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3756">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3757">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3757">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3758">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3758">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3759">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3759">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3760">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3760">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3761">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3761">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3762">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3762">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3763">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3763">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3764">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3764">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3765">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3765">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3766">ausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3766">ausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3767">gpid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3767">gpid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3768">id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3768">identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3769">identifikation</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3769">identifikation</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3770">identifizierungsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3770">identifizierungsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3771">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3771">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3772">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3772">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3773">id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3773">id-nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3774">个人 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3774">personal id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3775">personalausweis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3775">personalausweis</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3776">persönliche id nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3776">persönliche id nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3777">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3777">persönliche identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3778">persönliche-id-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3778">persönliche-id-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3779">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3779">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3780">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3780">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3781">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3781">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3782">10个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3782">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3783">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3783">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3784">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3784">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3785">第一个字符是数字或从该集合中的字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3785">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3786">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3786">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3787">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3787">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3788">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3788">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3790">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3790">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3792">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3793">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3793">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3794">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3794">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3795">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3795">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3796">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3796">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3797">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3797">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3798">找到以下任意五个关键字列表中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3798">A keyword from any of the five keyword lists is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3799">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3799">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Passport Number -->
<Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport2" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3808">geburtsdatum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3808">geburtsdatum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3814">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3814">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_german_passport2"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3815">Keyword_german_passport2</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3815">Keyword_german_passport2</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3817">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3817">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3818">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3818">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3819">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3819">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3820">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3820">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3821">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3821">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3822">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3822">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3823">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3823">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3824">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3824">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3825">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3825">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3826">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3826">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3827">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3827">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3828">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3828">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3829">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3829">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3830">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3830">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3831">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3831">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3832">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3832">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3833">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3833">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3834">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3834">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3835">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3835">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3836">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3836">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3837">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3837">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3838">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3838">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3839">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3839">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3843">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3843">steuernummer</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3844">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3845">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3845">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3846">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3846">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3847">免税#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3847">tax no#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3851">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3851">taxid#</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3863">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3863">Germany value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3864">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3865">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3865">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3866">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3866">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3867">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3867">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3868">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3868">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3869">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3869">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3870">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3870">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3871">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3871">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3872">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3872">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3873">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3873">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3874">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3874">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3875">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3875">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3876">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3877">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3877">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3878">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3879">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3879">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3880">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3880">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3881">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3881">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3882">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3882">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3883">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3883">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3884">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3884">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3885">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3885">Keyword_germany_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3886">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3886">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3887">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3887">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3888">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3888">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3889">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3889">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3890">mwst</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3890">mwst</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3891">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3891">mehrwertsteuer identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3892">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3892">mehrwertsteuer nummer</span></span>


## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3893">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3893">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3894">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3894">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3895">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3896">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3896">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3897">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3898">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3898">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3899">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3899">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3900">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3900">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3901">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3901">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3902">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3902">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3903">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3903">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3904">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3904">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3910">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3910">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3911">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3911">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3912">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3912">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3913">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3913">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3914">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3914">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3916">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3916">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3917">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3917">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3921">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3921">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3922">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3922">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3923">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3923">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3924">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3924">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3925">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3925">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3926">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3926">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3927">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3927">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3928">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3928">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3929">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3929">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3930">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3930">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3931">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3931">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3932">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3932">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3933">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3933">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3934">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3934">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3935">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3935">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3936">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3936">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3937">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3937">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3938">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3938">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3939">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3939">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3940">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3940">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3941">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3941">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_greece_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3942">Keyword_greece_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3942">Keyword_greece_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3943">希腊语 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3943">greek id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3944">希腊国家 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3944">greek national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3945">希腊语个人 id 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3945">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3946">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3946">greek police id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3947">identity 卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3947">identity card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3948">tautotita</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3948">tautotita</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3949">ταυτότητα</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3949">ταυτότητα</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3950">ταυτότητας</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3950">ταυτότητας</span></span>


## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3951">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3951">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3952">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3952">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3953">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3953">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3954">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3954">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3955">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3955">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3956">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3956">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3957">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3957">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3958">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3958">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3959">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3959">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3960">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3960">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3961">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3961">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3962">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3962">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3963">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3963">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_greece_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3964">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3964">Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3965">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3965">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3967">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3967">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3969">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3969">Greece tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3970">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3970">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3971">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3971">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3972">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3972">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3973">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3973">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3974">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3974">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3975">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3975">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3976">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3976">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3977">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3977">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3978">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3978">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-3979">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-3979">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4008">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4008">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4009">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4009">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4010">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4010">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4011">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4011">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4012">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4012">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4013">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4013">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4014">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4014">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4015">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4015">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4016">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4016">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4017">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4017">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4018">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4018">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4019">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4019">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4020">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4020">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4021">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4021">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4022">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4022">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4023">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4023">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4024">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4024">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4025">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4025">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4058">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4058">香港特別行政區永久性居民身份証</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4059">香港特別行政區永久性居民身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4059">香港特別行政區永久性居民身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4060">香港特別行政區永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4060">香港特別行政區永久性居民身分証</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4061">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4061">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4062">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4062">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身份証</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4063">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4063">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4064">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4064">香港特別行政區非永久性居民身分証</span></span>

   
## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4065">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4065">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4066">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4066">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4067">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4067">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4068">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4068">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4069">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4069">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4070">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4070">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4071">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4071">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4072">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4072">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4073">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4073">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4074">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4074">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4075">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4075">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4076">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4077">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4077">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4078">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4078">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4079">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4079">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4080">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4080">Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4083">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4083">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4084">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4084">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4085">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4085">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4086">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4086">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4087">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4087">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4088">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4088">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4089">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4089">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4090">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4090">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4091">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4091">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4094">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4094">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4095">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4095">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4096">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4096">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4097">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4097">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4098">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4098">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4099">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4099">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4100">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4100">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4101">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4101">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4102">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4102">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4103">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4103">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4104">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4104">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4105">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4105">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4106">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4106">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4107">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4107">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4108">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4108">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4109">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4109">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4110">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4110">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4111">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4111">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4112">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4112">Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4113">id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4113">id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4114">identification number
</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4114">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4115">sz ig</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4115">sz ig</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4116">sz.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4116">sz.</span></span><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4117">ig.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4117"> ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4118">ig。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4118">sz.ig.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4119">személyazonosító igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4119">személyazonosító igazolvány</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4120">személyi igazolvány</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4120">személyi igazolvány</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4121">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4121">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4122">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4122">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4123">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4123">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4124">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4124">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4125">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4125">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4126">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4126">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4127">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4127">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4128">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4128">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4129">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4129">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4130">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4130">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4131">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4131">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4132">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4132">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4133">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4133">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4134">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4134">Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4135">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4135">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4136">匈牙利语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4136">hungarian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4137">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4137">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4138">útlevél száma</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4138">útlevél száma</span></span>


## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4139">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4139">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4140">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4140">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4141">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4141">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4142">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4142">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4143">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4143">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4144">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4144">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4145">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4145">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4146">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4146">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4147">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4147">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4148">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4148">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4149">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4149">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4150">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4150">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4151">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4151">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4152">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4152">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4162">taj#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4162">taj#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4163">ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4163">ssn</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4164">ssn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4164">ssn#</span></span>

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4172">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4172">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4173">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4173">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4174">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4174">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4175">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4175">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4176">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4176">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4177">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4177">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4178">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4178">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4179">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4179">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4180">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4181">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4181">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4182">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4183">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4183">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4184">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4184">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4185">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4185">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4186">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4187">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4187">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4203">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4203">taxid#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4204">taxidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4204">taxidno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4205">taxidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4205">taxidnumber#</span></span>
