## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4213">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4213">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4214">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4215">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4215">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4216">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4217">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4217">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4218">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4218">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4219">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4219">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4220">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4220">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4221">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4221">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4222">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4222">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4223">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4223">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4224">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4224">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4225">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4225">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4226">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4226">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4227">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4227">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4228">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4228">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4229">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4229">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_hungary_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4230">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4230">Keyword_Hungary_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4231">vat</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4231">vat</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4232">增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4232">value added tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4233">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4233">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4234">vatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4234">vatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4235">hungarianvatno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4235">hungarianvatno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4236">纳税编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4236">tax no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4237">增值税áfa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4237">value added tax áfa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4238">közösségi adószám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4238">közösségi adószám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4239">általános forgalmi adó szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4239">általános forgalmi adó szám</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4240">hozzáadottérték adó</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4240">hozzáadottérték adó</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4241">áfa szám</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4241">áfa szám</span></span>


## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4242"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4242">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4243">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4243">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4244">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4244">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4245">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4245">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4246">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4246">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4247">五个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4247">Five letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4248">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4248">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4249">一个字母，是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4249">A letter which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4250">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4250">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4251">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4251">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4252">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4252">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4253">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4253">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4254">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4254">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4255">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4255">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4256">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4256">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
<Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4257">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4257">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4258">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4258">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4259">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4259">Permanent Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4260">蛋糕</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4260">PAN</span></span> 
   
## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4261">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4261">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4262">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4262">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4263">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4263">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4264">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4264">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4265">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4265">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4266">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4266">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4267">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4267">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4268">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4268">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4269">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4269">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4270">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4270">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4271">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4271">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4272">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4272">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4273">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4273">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4274">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4274">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4275">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4275">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4276">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4276">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4277">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4277">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4278">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4278">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4279">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4279">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4280">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4280">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4281">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4281">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4282">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4282">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4283">Aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4283">Aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4284">Aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4284">Aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4285">UID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4285">UID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4286">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4286">आधार</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4287">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4287">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4288">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4288">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4289">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4289">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4290">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4290">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4291">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4291">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4292">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4292">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4293">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4293">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4294">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4294">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4295">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4295">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4296">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4296">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4297">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4297">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4298">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4298">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4299">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4299">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4300">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4300">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4301">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4301">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4302">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4302">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4303">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4303">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4304">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4304">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4305">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4305">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4306">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4306">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4307">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4307">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4308">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4308">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4309">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4309">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4310">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4310">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4311"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4311">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4312">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4312">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4313">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4313">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4314">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4314">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4315">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4315">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4316">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4316">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4317">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4317">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4318">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4318">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4319">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4319">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-p131">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-p131">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4322">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4322">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4323">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4323">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4324">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4324">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4325">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4325">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4326">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4326">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4327">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4327">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4328">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4328">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4329">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4329">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4330">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4330">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4331">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4331">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4332">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4332">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4333">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4333">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4334">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4334">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4335">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4335">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4336">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4337">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4337">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4338">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4339">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4339">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4340">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4340">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4341">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4341">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4342">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4342">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4343">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4343">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4344">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4344">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4345">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4345">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4346">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4346">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4347">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4347">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4348">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4348">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4349">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4349">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4350">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4351">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4351">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4352">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4352">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4353">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4353">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4354">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4354">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4355">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4355">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4356">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4356">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4357">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4357">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4358">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4358">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4359">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4359">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4360">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4360">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4361">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4361">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4362">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4362">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4363">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4363">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4364">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4364">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4365">Dictionary_icd_9_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4365">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4366">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4366">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4367">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4367">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4368">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4368">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4369">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4369">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4370">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4370">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4371">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4371">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4372"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4372">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4373">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4373">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4374">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4374">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4375">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4375">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4376">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4376">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4377">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4377">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4378">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4378">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4379">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4379">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4380">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4380">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4381">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4381">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4382">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4382">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4383">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4383">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4384">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4384">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4385">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4385">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4386">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4386">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ipaddress"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4387">Keyword_ipaddress</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4387">Keyword_ipaddress</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4388">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4388">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4389">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4389">ip address</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4390">ip addresses</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4390">ip addresses</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4391">internet protocol</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4391">internet protocol</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4392">IP-כתובת ה</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4392">IP-כתובת ה</span></span> 

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4393">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4393">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4394">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4394">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4395">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4395">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4396">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4396">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4397">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4397">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4398">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4398">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4399">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4399">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4400">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4400">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4401">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4401">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4402">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4402">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4403">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4403">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4404">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4404">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4405">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4405">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4406">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4406">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4407">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4407">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4408">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4408">Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4409">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4409">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4410">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4410">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4411">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4411">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4412">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4412">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4413">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4413">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4414">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4414">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4415">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4415">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4416">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4416">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4417">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4417">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4418">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4418">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4419">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4419">driving license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4420">dlno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4420">dlno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4421">ceadúnas tiomána</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4421">ceadúnas tiomána</span></span>


## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4422">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4422">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4423">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4423">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4424">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4425">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4425">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4426">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4426">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4427">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4427">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4428">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4428">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4429">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4429">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4430">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4430">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4431">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4431">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4432">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4432">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4433">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4433">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4434">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4434">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4435">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4435">A keyword from  `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4436">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4436">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4437">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4437">Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4440">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4440">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4445">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4445">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4446">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4447">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4447">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4448">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4448">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4449">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4449">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4450">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4450">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4451">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4451">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4452">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4452">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4453">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4453">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4454">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4454">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4455">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4455">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4456">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4456">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4457">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4457">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4458">一个-I 范围内的可选字母，或 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4458">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4459">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4459">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4460">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4460">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4461">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4461">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4462">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4462">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4463">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4463">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4464">找到 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4464">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4465">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4465">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4466">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4466">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4467">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4467">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4468">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4468">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4513">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4513">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4514">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4514">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4515">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4515">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4516">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4516">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4517">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4517">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4518">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4518">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4519">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4519">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4520">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4520">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4521">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4521">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4522">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4522">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4523">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4523">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4524">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4524">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4525">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4525">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4526">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4526">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4527">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4527">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4528">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4528">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4529">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4529">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4530">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4530">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4531">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4531">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4532">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4532">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4533">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4533">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4534">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4534">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4535">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4535">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4536">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4536">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4537">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4537">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4539">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4539">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4540">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4541">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4541">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4542">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4543">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4543">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4544">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4545">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4545">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4546">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4546">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4547">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4547">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4548">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4548">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4549">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4549">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4550">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4550">Keyword_Israel_National_ID</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4551">מספר זהות</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4551">מספר זהות</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4552">National ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4552">National ID Number</span></span>
   
## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4553">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4553">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4554">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4554">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4555">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4556">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4556">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4557">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4557">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4558">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4558">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4559">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4559">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4560">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4560">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4561">七个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字或下划线字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4561">seven letters (not case sensitive), digits, or the underscore character</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4562">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4562">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4563">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4563">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4564">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4564">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4565">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4565">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4566">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4566">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4567">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4567">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4568">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4568">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4569">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4569">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4570">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4570">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4571">numero di patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4571">numero di patente di guida</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4572">patente di guida</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4572">patente di guida</span></span> 

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4573">意大利会计代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4573">Italy fiscal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4574">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4574">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4575">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4575">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4576">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4576">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4577">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4577">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4578">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4578">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4579">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4579">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4580">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4580">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4581">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4581">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4582">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4582">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4583">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4583">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4584">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4584">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4585">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4585">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4586">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4586">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4587">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4587">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4588">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4588">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4589">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4589">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4590">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4590">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4591">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4591">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4592">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4592">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4627">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4627">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4628">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4628">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4629">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4629">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4630">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4630">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4631">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4631">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4632">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4632">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4633">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4633">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4634">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4634">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4635">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4636">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4636">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4637">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4638">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4639">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4639">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4640">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4640">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4652">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4652">Italy value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4654">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4654">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4655">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4656">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4656">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4657">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4657">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4658">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4658">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4659">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4659">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4660">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4660">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4661">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4661">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4662">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4662">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4663">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4663">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4664">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4664">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4665">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4665">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4666">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4666">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4667">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4667">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4668">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4668">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4669">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4669">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4670">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4670">Keyword_italy_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4673">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4673">vat#</span></span>

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4676">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4676">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4677">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4677">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4678">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4678">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4679">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4679">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4680">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4680">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4681">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4681">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4682">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4682">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4683">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4683">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4684">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4684">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4685">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4685">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4686">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4686">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4687">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4687">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4688">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4688">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4689">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4689">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4690">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4690">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4691">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4691">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4692">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4692">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4693">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4693">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4694">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4694">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4695">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4696">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4696">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4697">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4697">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4756">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4756">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4757">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4758">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4758">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4759">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4760">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4760">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4761">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4762">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4762">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4763">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4764">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4765">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4765">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4766">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4766">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
