## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4794">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4794">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4795">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4795">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4796">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4796">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4797">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4797">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4798">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4798">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4799">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4799">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4800">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4800">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4801">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4801">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4802">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4802">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4803">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4803">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4804">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4804">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4805">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4805">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4806">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4806">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4807">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4807">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4808">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4808">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4809">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4809">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4813">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4813">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4814">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4814">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4815">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4815">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4816">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4816">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4817">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4817">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4818">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4818">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4819">法人番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4819">法人番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4820">指定通知書</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4820">指定通知書</span></span>


## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4821">日本我的号码-个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4821">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4822">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4822">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4823">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4823">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4824">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4824">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4825">12位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4825">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4826">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4826">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4827">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4827">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4828">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4828">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4829">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4829">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4830">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4830">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4831">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4832">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4832">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4833">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4834">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4835">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4835">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4836">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4836">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4837">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4837">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4838">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4838">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4844">共通番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4844">共通番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4845">マイナンバーカード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4845">マイナンバーカード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4846">マイナンバーカード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4846">マイナンバーカード番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4847">個人番号カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4847">個人番号カード</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4848">個人識別番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4848">個人識別番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4849">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4849">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4850">通知カード</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4850">通知カード</span></span>

   
## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4851">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4851">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4852">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4852">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4853">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4853">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4854">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4854">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4855">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4855">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4856">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4856">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4857">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4857">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4858">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4858">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4859">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4859">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4860">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4860">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4861">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4861">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4862">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4862">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4863">Keyword_jp_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4863">Keyword_jp_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4864">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4864">パスポート</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4865">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4865">パスポート番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4866">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4866">パスポートのNum</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4867">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4867">パスポート＃</span></span> 

## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4868">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4868">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4869">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4870">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4870">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4871">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4872">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4872">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4873">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4873">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4874">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4874">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4875">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4875">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4876">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4876">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4877">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4877">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4878">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4878">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4879">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4879">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4880">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4880">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4881">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4881">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4882">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4882">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_residence_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4883">Keyword_jp_residence_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4884">住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4884">Residence card number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4885">住宅卡编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4885">Residence card no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4886">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4886">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4887">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4887">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4888">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4888">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4889">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4889">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4890">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4890">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4891">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4891">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4892">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4892">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4893">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4893">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4894">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4894">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4895">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4895">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4896">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4896">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4897">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4897">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4898">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4898">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4899">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4899">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_resident_registration_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4900">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4900">Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4901">Resident Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4901">Resident Registration Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4902">Resident Register Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4902">Resident Register Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4903">Residents Basic Registry Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4903">Residents Basic Registry Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4904">Resident Registration No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4904">Resident Registration No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4905">Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4905">Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4906">Residents Basic Registry No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4906">Residents Basic Registry No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4907">Basic Resident Register No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4907">Basic Resident Register No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4908">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4908">住民登録番号、登録番号をレジデント</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4909">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4909">住民基本登録番号、登録番号</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4910">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4910">住民基本レジストリ番号を常駐</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4911">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4911">登録番号を常駐住民基本台帳登録番号</span></span> 

   
## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4912">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4912">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4913">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4913">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4914">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4914">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4915">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4915">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4916">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4916">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4917">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4917">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4918">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4918">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4919">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4919">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4920">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4920">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4921">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4921">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4922">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4922">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4923">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4923">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4924">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4924">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4925">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4925">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4926">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4926">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4927">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4927">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4928">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4928">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4929">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4929">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4930">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4930">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_jp_sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4931">Keyword_jp_sin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4931">Keyword_jp_sin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4932">Social Insurance No.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4932">Social Insurance No.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4933">Social Insurance Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4933">Social Insurance Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4934">Social Insurance Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4934">Social Insurance Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4935">社会保険のテンキー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4935">社会保険のテンキー</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4936">社会保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4936">社会保険番号</span></span> 

## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4937">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4937">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4938">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4938">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4939">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4939">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4940">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4940">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4941">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4941">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4942">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4942">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4943">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4943">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4944">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4944">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4945">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4945">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4946">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4946">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4947">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4947">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4948">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4948">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4949">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4949">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4950">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4950">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4951">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4951">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4966">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4966">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4967">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4967">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4968">11个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4968">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4969">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4969">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4970">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4970">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4971">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4971">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4972">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4972">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4973">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4973">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4974">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4974">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4975">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4975">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4976">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4976">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4977">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4977">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4978">两位数 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4978">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4979">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4979">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4980">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4980">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4981">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4981">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4982">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4982">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4983">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4983">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4984">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4984">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4985">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4985">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4986">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4986">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-4987">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-4987">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5050">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5050">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5051">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5051">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5052">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5053">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5053">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5054">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5054">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5055">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5055">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5056">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5056">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5057">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5057">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5058">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5058">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5059">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5059">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5060">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5060">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5061">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5061">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5062">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5062">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5063">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5063">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5064">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5064">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5065">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5065">Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5066">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5066">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5067">拉脱维亚语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5067">latvian passport number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5070">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5070">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5071">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5071">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5072">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5072">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5073">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5073">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5074">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5074">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5075">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5075">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5076">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5076">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5077">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5077">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5078">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5078">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5079">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5079">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5080">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5080">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5081">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5081">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_lithuania_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5083">Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5083">Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5087">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5087">driver licence</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5094">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5094">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5097">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5097">Lithuania personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5098">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5098">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5099">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5099">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5100">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5100">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5101">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5101">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5102">一种数字 (1-6) ，对应于个人的性别和出生世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5102">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5103">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5103">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5104">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5104">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5105">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5105">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5106">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5106">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5107">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5107">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5108">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5108">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5109">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5109">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5110">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5110">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5111">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5111">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5112">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5112">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5113">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5113">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5148">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5148">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5149">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5149">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5151">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5151">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5153">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5153">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5154">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5154">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5155">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5155">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5156">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5156">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5157">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5157">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5158">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5158">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5159">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5159">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5160">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5160">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5166">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5166">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5167">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5167">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5168">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5169">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5169">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5170">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5171">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5171">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5172">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5172">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5173">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5173">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5174">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5174">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5175">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5175">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5176">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5176">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5177">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5177">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5183">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5183">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5193">Luxemburg (自然个人的国家标识号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5193">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5194">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5194">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5195">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5195">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5196">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5196">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5197">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5197">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5198">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5198">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5199">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5199">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5200">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5200">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5201">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5201">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5202">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5202">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5203">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5203">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5204">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5204">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5205">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5205">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5206">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5206">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5207">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5207">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5230">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5230">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5231">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5231">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5232">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5232">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5233">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5233">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5234">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5234">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5235">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5235">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5236">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5236">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5237">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5237">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5238">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5238">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5239">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5239">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5240">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5240">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5241">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5241">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5242">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5242">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5243">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5243">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5244">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5244">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5246">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5246">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5247">passnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5247">passnummer</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5248">Luxemburg 国内标识号 (非自然个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5248">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5249">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5249">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5250">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5250">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5251">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5251">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5252">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5252">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5253">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5253">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5254">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5254">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5255">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5255">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5256">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5256">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5257">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5257">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5258">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5258">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5259">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5259">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5260">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5260">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5262">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5262">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5264">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5265">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5265">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5266">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5266">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5267">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5267">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5268">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5268">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5308">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5308">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5309">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5309">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5310">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5310">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5311">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5311">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5312">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5312">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5313">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5313">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5314">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5314">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5315">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5315">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5316">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5316">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5317">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5317">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5318">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5318">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5319">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5319">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5320">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5320">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5321">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5321">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5322">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5322">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5323">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5323">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5324">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5324">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5326">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5326">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5342">mykad</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5342">mykad</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5351">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5351">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5352">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5352">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5353">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5353">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5354">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5354">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5355">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5355">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5356">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5356">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5357">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5357">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5358">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5358">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5359">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5359">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5360">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5360">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5361">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5361">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5362">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5362">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5363">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5363">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5364">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5364">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5365">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5365">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5366">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5366">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5367">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5367">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
<!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
 <Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5368">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5368">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5369">Keywords_malta_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5369">Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5370">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5370">dl#</span></span>

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5383">马耳他身份卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5383">Malta identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5384">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5384">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5385">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5385">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5386">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5386">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5387">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5387">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5388">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5388">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5389">在 "M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z" (不区分大小写中的一个字母) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5389">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5390">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5390">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5391">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5391">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5392">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5392">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5393">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5393">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5394">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5394">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5395">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5395">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5396">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5396">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5397">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5397">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5402">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5402">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5405">numru ta "identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5405">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5408">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5408">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5409">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5409">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5411">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5411">unique identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5412">唯一标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5412">unique identity number</span></span>

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5414">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5414">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5415">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5415">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5416">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5416">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5417">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5417">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5418">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5418">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5419">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5419">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5420">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5421">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5421">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5422">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5423">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5423">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5424">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5424">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5425">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5425">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5427">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5427">Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5430">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5430">passport no</span></span>
