## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5432">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5432">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5433">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5433">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5434">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5434">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5435">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5435">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5436">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5436">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5437">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5437">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5438">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5438">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5439">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5439">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5440">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5440">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5441">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5441">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5442">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5442">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5443">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5443">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5444">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5444">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5445">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5445">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5446">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5446">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5447">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5447">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5448">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5448">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5449">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5449">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5450">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5450">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5451">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5451">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5452">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5452">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5453">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5453">Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5456">identifika numru tal-biljett</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5456">identifika numru tal-biljett</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5457">kodiċi numerali personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5457">kodiċi numerali personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5458">numru ta "identifikazzjoni personali</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5458">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni personali</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5459">numru ta "identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5459">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5460">numru ta "identifikazzjoni uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5460">numru ta 'identifikazzjoni uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5461">numru ta "identità uniku</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5461">numru ta' identità uniku</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5462">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5462">numru tas-servizz taċ-ċittadin</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5463">numru tat-taxxa</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5463">numru tat-taxxa</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5464">个人数字代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5464">personal numeric code</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5465">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5484">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5484">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5485">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5485">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5486">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5486">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5487">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5487">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5488">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5488">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5489">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5489">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5490">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5490">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5491">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5491">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5492">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5492">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5493">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5493">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5494">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5494">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5495">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5495">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5496">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5496">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5497">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5497">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5498">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5498">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5499">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5499">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5500">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5500">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5524">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5524">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5525">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5525">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5526">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5526">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5527">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5527">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5528">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5528">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5529">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5529">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5530">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5530">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5531">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5531">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5532">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5532">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5533">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5533">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5534">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5534">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5535">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5535">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5553">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5553">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5554">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5554">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5555">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5555">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5556">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5556">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5557">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5557">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5558">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5558">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5559">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5559">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5560">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5560">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5561">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5561">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5562">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5562">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5563">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5563">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5564">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5564">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5565">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5565">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5566">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5566">Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5567">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5567">dutch passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5568">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5568">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5569">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5569">netherlands passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5570">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5570">nederlanden paspoort nummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5571">paspoort</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5571">paspoort</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5572">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5572">nederlanden paspoortnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5573">paspoortnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5573">paspoortnummer</span></span>

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5574">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5574">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5575">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5575">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5576">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5576">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5577">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5577">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5578">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5578">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5579">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5579">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5580">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5580">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5581">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5581">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5582">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5582">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5583">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5583">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5584">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5584">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5585">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5585">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5586">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5586">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5624">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5624">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5625">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5626">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5626">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5627">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5628">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5628">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5629">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5629">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5630">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5630">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5631">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5631">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5632">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5632">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5633">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5633">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5634">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5634">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5635">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5635">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5636">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5636">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5637">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5637">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5638">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5638">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5639">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5639">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5640">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5640">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5641">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5641">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5642">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5642">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5643">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5643">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5644">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5644">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5645">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5645">Keyword_netherlands_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5646">vat 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5646">vat number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5647">vat 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5647">vat no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5648">vat#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5648">vat#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5649">wearde tafoege 税 getal</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5649">wearde tafoege tax getal</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5650">btw nûmer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5650">btw nûmer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5651">btw-nummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5651">btw-nummer</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5652">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5652">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5653">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5653">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5654">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5654">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5655">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5655">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5656">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5656">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5657">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5657">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5658">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5658">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5659">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5659">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5660">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5660">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5661">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5661">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5662">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5662">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5663">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5663">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5664">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5664">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5665">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5665">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5666">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5666">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5667">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5667">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5668">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5668">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5669">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5669">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5670">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5670">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5671">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5671">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5672">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5672">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5673">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5673">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5674">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5674">Keyword_new_zealand_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5675">帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5675">account number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5676">银行帐户</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5676">bank account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5677">bank_acct_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5677">bank_acct_id</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5680">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5680">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5681">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5681">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5682">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5682">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5683">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5683">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5684">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5684">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5685">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5685">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5686">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5686">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5687">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5687">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5688">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5688">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5689">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5689">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5690">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5690">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5691">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5691">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5692">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5692">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5693">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5693">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5694">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5694">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5761">新西兰 inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5761">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5762">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5762">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5763">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5763">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5764">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5764">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5765">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5765">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5766">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5766">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5767">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5767">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5768">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5768">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5769">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5769">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5770">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5770">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5771">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5771">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5772">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5772">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5773">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5773">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5774">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5774">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5775">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5775">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5776">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5776">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5777">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5777">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5778">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5778">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5779">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5779">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5780">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5780">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5781">ird。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5781">ird no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5782">ird no#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5782">ird no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5783">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5783">nz ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5784">新西兰 ird</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5784">new zealand ird</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5785">ird 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5785">ird number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5786">inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5786">inland revenue number</span></span>


## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5787">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5787">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5788">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5789">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5789">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5790">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5791">三个字母 (不区分大小写)  (可选的空格) 四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5791">three letters (not case sensitive) a space (optional) four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5792">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5792">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5793">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5793">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5794">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5794">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5795">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5795">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5796">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5796">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5797">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5797">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5798">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5798">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
<Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5799">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5799">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_nz_terms"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5800">Keyword_nz_terms</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5800">Keyword_nz_terms</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5801">NHI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5801">NHI</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5802">New Zealand</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5802">New Zealand</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5803">健康</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5803">Health</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5804">治疗</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5804">treatment</span></span> 


## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5805">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5805">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5807">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5807">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5809">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5809">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5810">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5810">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5811">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5811">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5812">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5812">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5813">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5813">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5814">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5814">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5815">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5815">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5816">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5816">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5817">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5817">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5818">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5818">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5819">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5819">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5820">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5820">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5821">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5821">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5822">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5822">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5823">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5823">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5824">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5824">Keyword_new_zealand_social_welfare_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5825">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5825">social welfare #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5826">社交 welfare#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5826">social welfare#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5827">社会 welfare 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5827">social welfare No.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5828">社会 welfare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5828">social welfare number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5829">swn#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5829">swn#</span></span>

   
## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5830">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5830">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5831">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5831">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5832">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5832">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5833">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5833">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5834">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5834">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5835">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5835">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5836">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5836">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5837">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5837">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5838">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5838">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5839">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5839">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5840">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5840">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5841">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5841">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5842">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5842">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5843">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5843">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5844">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5844">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5845">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5846">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5846">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5847">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5847">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5848">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5848">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_norway_id_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5849">Keyword_norway_id_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5849">Keyword_norway_id_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5852">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5852">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5853">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5853">Identification</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5854">Personnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5854">Personnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5855">Fødselsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5855">Fødselsnummer</span></span>

   
## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5856">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5856">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5857">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5857">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5858">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5858">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5859">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5859">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5860">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5860">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5861">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5861">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5862">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5862">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5863">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5863">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5864">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5864">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5865">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5865">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5866">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5866">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5867">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5867">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5868">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5868">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5869">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5869">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5870">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5870">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5871">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5871">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5872">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5872">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_philippines_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5873">Keyword_philippines_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5873">Keyword_philippines_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5874">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5874">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5875">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5875">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5876">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5876">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5877">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5877">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5878">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5878">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5879">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5879">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5881">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5881">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5882">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5883">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5883">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5884">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5884">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5885">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5885">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5886">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5886">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5887">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5887">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5888">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5888">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5889">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5889">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5890">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5890">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5891">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5891">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5892">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5892">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5893">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5893">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5894">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5894">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5902">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5902">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5903">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5903">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5904">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5904">driver's license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5907">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5907">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5910">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5910">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5911">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5911">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5912">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5912">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5913">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5913">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5914">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5914">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5915">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5915">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5916">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5916">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5917">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5917">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5918">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5918">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5919">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5919">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5920">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5920">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5921">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5921">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5922">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5922">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5923">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5923">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5924">Dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5924">Dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5925">器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5925">Numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5926">Nazwa i 器 dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5926">Nazwa i numer dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5927">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5927">Nazwa i nr dowodu osobistego</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5928">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5928">Nazwa i nr dowodu tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5929">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5929">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5930">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5930">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5931">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5931">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5932">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5932">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5933">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5933">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5934">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5934">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5935">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5935">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5936">表示出生日期的6个数字 YYMMDD 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5936">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5937">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5937">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5938">1校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5938">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5939">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5939">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5940">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5940">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5941">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5941">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5942">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5942">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5943">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5943">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5944">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5944">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5945">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5945">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5946">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5946">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5947">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5947">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5948">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5948">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5949">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5949">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_pesel_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5950">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5950">Keyword_pesel_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5951">dowód osobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5951">dowód osobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5952">dowódosobisty</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5952">dowódosobisty</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5953">niepowtarzalny 器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5953">niepowtarzalny numer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5954">niepowtarzalnynumer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5954">niepowtarzalnynumer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5955">nr.-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5955">nr.-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5956">nr-pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5956">nr-pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5957">器 identyfikacyjny</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5957">numer identyfikacyjny</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5958">pesel</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5958">pesel</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5959">tożsamości narodowej</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5959">tożsamości narodowej</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5960">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5960">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5961">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5961">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5962">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5962">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5963">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5963">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5964">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5964">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5965">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5965">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5966">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5966">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5967">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5967">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5968">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5968">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5969">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5969">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5970">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5970">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5971">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5971">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5972">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5972">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5973">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5973">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5974">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5974">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5975">器 paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5975">Numer paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5976">Führerschein-nr.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5976">Nr.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5977">Paszportu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5977">Paszportu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5978">Paszport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5978">Paszport</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5979">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5979">Poland REGON number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5980">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5980">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5981">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5981">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5982">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5982">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5983">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5983">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5984">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5984">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5985">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5985">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5986">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5986">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5987">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5987">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5988">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5988">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5989">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5989">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5990">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5990">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5991">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5991">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5992">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5992">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5993">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5993">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5994">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5994">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-5995">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-5995">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6000">统计 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6000">statistical id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6001">统计否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6001">statistical no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6002">regon 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6002">regon number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6005">公司 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6005">company id</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6012">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6012">Poland tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6014">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6014">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6015">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6016">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6016">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6017">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6017">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6018">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6018">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6019">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6019">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6020">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6020">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6021">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6021">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6022">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6022">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6052">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6052">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6053">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6053">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6054">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6054">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6055">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6055">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6056">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6056">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6057">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6057">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6058">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6058">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6059">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6059">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6060">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6060">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6061">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6061">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6062">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6062">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
