## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6082">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6082">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6083">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6083">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6084">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6084">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6085">两个字母后跟指定模式中的七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6085">two letters followed by a seven numbers in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6086">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6086">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6087">两个字母后跟七个包含特殊字符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6087">two letters followed by seven numbers with special characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6088">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6088">two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6089">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6089">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6090">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6090">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6091">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6091">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6092">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6092">one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6093">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6093">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6094">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6094">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6095">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6095">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6096">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6096">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6097">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6097">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6098">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6098">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
```

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6114">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6114">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6115">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6115">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6116">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6116">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6117">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6117">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6118">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6118">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6119">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6119">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6120">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6120">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6121">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6121">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6122">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6122">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6123">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6123">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6124">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6124">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6125">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6125">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6126">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6126">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6127">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6127">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6129">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6129">Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6134">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6134">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6135">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6135">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6136">9个带可选空格的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6136">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6137">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6137">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6138">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6138">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6139">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6139">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6140">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6140">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6141">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6141">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6142">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6142">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6143">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6143">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6144">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6144">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6145">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6145">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6146">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6146">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6147">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6147">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6148">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6148">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6149">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6149">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6150">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6150">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6175">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6175">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6176">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6176">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6178">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6178">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6180">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6180">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6181">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6181">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6182">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6182">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6183">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6183">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6184">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6184">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6185">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6185">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6186">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6186">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6187">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6187">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6188">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6188">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6204">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6204">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6205">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6205">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6206">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6206">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6207">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6207">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6208">1-9 的1位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6208">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6209">代表出生日期 (YYMMDD 的6个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6209">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6210">2位数，可以为01-52 或99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6210">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6211">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6211">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6212">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6212">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6213">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6213">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6214">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6214">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6215">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6215">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6216">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6216">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6217">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6217">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6218">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6219">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6219">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6270">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6270">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6271">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6271">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6272">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6272">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6273">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6273">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6274">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6274">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6275">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6275">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6276">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6276">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6277">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6277">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6278">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6278">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6279">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6279">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6280">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6280">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6281">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6281">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6282">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6282">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_romania_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6283">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6283">Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6284">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6284">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6285">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6285">romanian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6286">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6286">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6287">numărul pașaportului</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6287">numărul pașaportului</span></span>


## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6288">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6288">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6289">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6289">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6290">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6290">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6291">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6291">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6292">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6292">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6293">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6293">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6294">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6294">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6295">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6295">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6296">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6296">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6297">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6297">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6298">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6298">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6299">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6299">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6300">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6300">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6301">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6301">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6302">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6302">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6303">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6303">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6304">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6304">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_russia_passport_number_domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6305">Keyword_russia_passport_number_domestic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6305">Keyword_russia_passport_number_domestic</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6306">护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6306">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6307">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6307">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6308">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6308">passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6309">护照 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6309">passport id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6310">passportno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6310">passportno#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6311">passportnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6311">passportnumber#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6312">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6312">паспорт нет</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6314">pоссийской паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6314">pоссийской паспорт</span></span>

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6320">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6320">Russia passport number international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6321">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6321">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6322">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6322">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6323">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6323">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6324">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6324">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6325">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6325">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6326">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6326">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6327">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6327">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6328">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6328">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6329">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6329">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6330">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6330">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6331">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6331">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6332">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6332">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6333">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6333">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6342">паспорт нет</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6342">паспорт нет</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6343">паспорт id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6343">паспорт id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6344">pоссийской паспорт</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6344">pоссийской паспорт</span></span>

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6350">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6350">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6351">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6351">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6352">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6352">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6353">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6353">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6354">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6354">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6355">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6355">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6356">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6356">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6357">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6357">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6358">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6358">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6359">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6359">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6360">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6360">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6361">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6361">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6362">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6362">Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6363">Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6363">Identification Card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6365">ID number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6365">ID number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6366">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6366">الوطنية الهوية بطاقة رقم</span></span> 

   
## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6367">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6367">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6368">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6368">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6369">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6369">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6370">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6370">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6371">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6371">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6372">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6372">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6373">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6373">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6374">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6374">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6375">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6375">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6376">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6376">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6377">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6377">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6378">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6378">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6379">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6379">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6380">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6380">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6381">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6381">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6382">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6382">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6383">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6383">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6384">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6384">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_singapore_nric"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6386">Keyword_singapore_nric</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6386">Keyword_singapore_nric</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6395">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6395">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6396">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6396">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6397">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6397">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6398">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6398">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6399">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6399">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6400">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6400">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6401">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6401">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6402">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6402">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6403">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6403">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6404">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6404">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6405">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6405">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6406">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6406">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6407">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6407">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6408">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6408">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovaknia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6409">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6409">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6410">Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6410">Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6411">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6411">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6412">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6412">driver license</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6414">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6414">driver licence</span></span>

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6424">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6424">Slovakia personal number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6426">九或十个数字，包含可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6426">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6427">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6428">代表出生日期的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6428">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6429">可选的斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6429">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6430">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6430">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6431">1可选校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6431">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6432">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6432">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6433">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6433">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6434">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6434">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6435">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6435">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6436">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6436">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6437">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6437">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6438">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6438">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6439">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6439">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6486">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6486">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6487">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6487">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6488">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6488">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6489">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6489">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6490">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6490">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6491">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6491">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6492">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6492">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6493">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6493">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6494">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6494">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6495">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6495">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6496">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6496">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6497">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6497">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6498">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6498">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6499">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6499">Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6500">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6500">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6502">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6502">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6504">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6504">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6505">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6505">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6506">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6506">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6507">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6507">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6508">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6508">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6509">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6509">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6510">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6510">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6511">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6511">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6512">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6512">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6513">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6513">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6514">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6514">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6515">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6515">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6516">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6516">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6517">Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6517">Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6531">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6531">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6532">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6532">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6533">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6533">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6534">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6534">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6535">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6535">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6536">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6536">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6537">两个数字，对应于出生区域 "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6537">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6538">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6538">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6539">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6539">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6540">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6540">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6541">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6541">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6542">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6542">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6543">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6543">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6544">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6544">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6545">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6545">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6546">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6546">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6547">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6547">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6575">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6575">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6576">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6576">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6577">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6577">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6578">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6578">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6579">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6579">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6580">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6580">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6581">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6581">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6582">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6582">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6583">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6583">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6584">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6584">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6585">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6585">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6586">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6586">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6587">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6587">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6588">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6588">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6589">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6589">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6590">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6590">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6591">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6591">Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6592">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6592">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6593">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6593">slovenian passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6594">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6594">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6595">številka potnega lista</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6595">številka potnega lista</span></span>

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6596">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6596">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6597">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6597">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6598">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6598">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6599">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6599">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6600">一个从1-9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6600">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6601">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6601">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6602">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6602">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6603">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6603">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6604">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6604">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6605">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6605">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6606">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6606">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6607">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6607">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6608">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6608">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6609">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6609">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6610">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6610">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6611">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6611">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6612">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6612">Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6613">davčna številka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6613">davčna številka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6614">identifikacijska številka davka</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6614">identifikacijska številka davka</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6615">številka davčne datoteke</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6615">številka davčne datoteke</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6616">税文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6616">tax file no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6617">税文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6617">tax file number</span></span>

</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6618">tax id</span></span>

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6634">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6634">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6635">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6635">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6636">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6636">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6637">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6637">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6638">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6638">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6639">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6639">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6640">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6640">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6641">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6641">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6642">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6642">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6643">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6643">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6644">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6644">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6645">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6645">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6646">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6646">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6647">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6647">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6648">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6648">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6649">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6649">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6650">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6650">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6651">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6651">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_africa_identification_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6652">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6652">Keyword_south_africa_identification_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6655">Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6655">Identification</span></span> 
   
## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6656">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6656">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6657">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6657">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6658">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6658">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6659">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6659">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6660">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6660">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6661">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6661">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6662">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6662">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6663">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6663">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6664">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6664">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6665">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6665">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6666">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6666">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6667">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6668">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6668">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6669">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6670">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6670">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6671">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6671">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6672">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6672">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6673">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6673">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6674">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6674">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6675">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6675">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6676">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6676">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6678">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6678">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6681">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6681">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6682">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6682">RRN</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6684">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6684">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6685">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6685">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6686">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6687">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6687">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6688">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6689">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6689">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6690">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6690">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6691">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6691">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6692">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6693">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6693">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6694">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6695">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6696">函数  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6696">The function  `Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6697">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6697">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6728">número de permiso conducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6728">número de permiso conducir</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6729">número permiso conducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6729">número permiso conducir</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6730">permiso conducir</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6730">permiso conducir</span></span>

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6734">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6734">Spain DNI</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6735">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6736">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6736">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6737">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6738">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6738">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6739">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6739">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6740">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6740">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6741">一个检查信函 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6741">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6742">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6742">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6743">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6743">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6744">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6744">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6745">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6745">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6746">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6746">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6747">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6747">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6748">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6748">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6749">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6749">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6763">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6763">nationalidno#</span></span>

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6773">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6773">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6774">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6774">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6776">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6776">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6777">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6778">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6778">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6779">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6779">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6780">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6780">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6781">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6781">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6782">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6782">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6783">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6783">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6784">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6784">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6785">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6785">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6786">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6786">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6787">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6787">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6788">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6788">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_spain_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6789">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6789">Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number</span></span>
