- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6797">西班牙 pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6797">españa pasaporte</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6798">pasaporte</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6798">pasaporte</span></span>


## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6799"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6799">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6800">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6800">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6801">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6801">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6802">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6802">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6803">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6803">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6804">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6804">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6805">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6805">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6806">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6806">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6807">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6807">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6808">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6808">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6809">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6809">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6810">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6810">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6811">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6811">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6812">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6812">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6813">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6813">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6814">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6814">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6815">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6815">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6816">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6816">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6817">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6817">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6818">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6818">Spain tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6819">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6819">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6820">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6820">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6821">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6821">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6822">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6822">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6823">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6823">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6824">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6824">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6825">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6825">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6826">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6826">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6827">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6827">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6828">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6828">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6829">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6829">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6830">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6830">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6831">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6831">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6832">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6832">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6833">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6833">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6834">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6834">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6835">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6835">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6836">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6836">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6837">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6837">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6838">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6838">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6839">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6839">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6841">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6841">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6842">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6842">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6843">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6843">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6844">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6844">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6845">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6845">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6846">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6846">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6847">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6847">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6848">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6848">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6879">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6879">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6880">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6880">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6881">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6881">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6882">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6882">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6883">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6883">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6884">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6884">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6885">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6885">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6886">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6886">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6887">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6887">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6888">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6888">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6889">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6889">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6890">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6890">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6891">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6891">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6892">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6892">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6893">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6893">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6894">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6894">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6895">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6895">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6896">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6896">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6897">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6897">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6898">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6898">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_globalfilter"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6899">CEP_GlobalFilter</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6899">CEP_GlobalFilter</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6900">部分密码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6900">some-password</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6901">somepassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6901">somepassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6902">secretPassword</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6902">secretPassword</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6903">采用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6903">sample</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_passwordplaceholder"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6904">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6904">CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6905"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6905">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6906">密码或密码后跟0-2 个空格、一个等号 (=) 、0-2 空格和一个星号 ( \* ) --或--------------</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6906">Password or pwd followed by 0-2 spaces, an equal sign (=), 0-2 spaces, and an asterisk (\*) --OR--</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6907">密码或密码后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6907">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6908">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6908">Equal sign (=)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6909">小于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6909">Less than symbol (<)</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6910">1-200 个字符的任意组合，这些字符为大写或小写字母、数字、星号 ( \* ) 、连字符 ( ) 、下划线 (_) 或空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6910">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6911">大于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6911">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>

#### <a name="cep_commonexamplekeywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6912">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6912">CEP_CommonExampleKeywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6913"> (请注意，从技术上讲，此敏感信息类型通过使用正则表达式（而不是关键字列表）来标识这些关键字。 ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6913">(Note that technically, this sensitive information type identifies these keywords by using a regular expression, not a keyword list.)</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6914">尚未</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6914">contoso</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6916">罗斯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6916">northwind</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6917">沙盒</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6917">sandbox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6918">onebox</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6918">onebox</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6919">localhost</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6919">localhost</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6920">127.0.0.1</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6920">127.0.0.1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6921">testacs.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6921">testacs.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6922">com</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6922">com</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6923">s-int。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6923">s-int.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6924">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6924">net</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6925">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6925">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6926">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6926">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6927">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6928">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6928">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6929">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6929">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6930">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6930">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6931">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6931">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6932">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6932">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6933">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6933">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6934">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6934">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6935">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6935">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6936">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6936">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6937">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6937">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6938">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6938">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6939">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6939">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="b8fe86d1-c056-453b-bfaa-9fe698699ecc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity> 
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6940">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6940">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6941">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver "s_license_number**</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6941">**Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number**</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6942">通讯#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6942">dl#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6943">driver license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6943">driver license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6944">驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6944">driver license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6945">驱动程序许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6945">driver licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6946">驱动程序许可证。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6946">drivers lic.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6947">drivers license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6947">drivers license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6948">drivers licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6948">drivers licence</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6949">driver's license</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6949">driver's license</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6950">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6950">driver's license number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6951">驾驶许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6951">driver's licence number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6952">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6952">driving license number</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6955">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6955">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6956">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6956">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6957">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6957">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6958">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6958">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6959">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6959">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6960">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6960">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6961">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6961">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6962">"-" 或 "+" 的分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6962">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6963">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6963">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6964">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6965">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6965">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6966">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6967">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6967">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6968">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6968">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6969">找到了 from 关键字 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6969">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6970">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6970">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6971">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6971">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6972">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6972">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6973">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6973">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6992">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6992">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6993">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6993">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6994">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6994">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6995">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6995">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6996">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6996">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6997">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6997">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6998">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6998">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-6999">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-6999">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7000">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7000">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7001">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7001">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7002">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7002">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7003">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7003">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7004">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7004">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7005">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7005">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7034">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7034">PasseportNon</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7035">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7035">Passeportn °</span></span> 

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7036">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7036">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7037">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7037">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7038">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7038">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7039">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7039">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7040">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7040">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7041">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7041">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7042">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7042">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7043">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7043">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7044">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7044">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7045">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7045">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7046">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7046">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7047">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7047">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7048">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7048">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7049">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7049">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7050">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7050">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7051">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7051">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7052">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7052">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7053">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7053">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7054">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7054">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7056">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7056">Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7057">个人 id 号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7057">personal id number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7058">identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7058">identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7059">个人 id 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7059">personal id no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7060">identity no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7060">identity no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7062">个人标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7062">personal identification no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7068">personnummer#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7068">personnummer#</span></span>

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7070">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7070">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7071">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7071">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7072">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7072">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7073">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7073">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7074">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7074">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7075">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7075">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7076">正号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7076">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7077">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7077">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7078">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7078">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7079">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7079">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7080">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7080">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7081">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7081">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7082">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7082">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7083">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7083">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7084">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7084">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7085">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7085">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7086">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7086">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7087">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7087">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7088">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7088">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7114">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7114">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7115">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7115">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7116">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7116">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7117">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7117">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7118">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7118">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7119">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7119">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7120">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7120">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7121">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7121">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7122">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7122">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7123">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7123">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7124">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7125">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7126">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7127">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7128">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7128">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7129">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7129">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7130">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7130">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="swiss-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7163">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7163">Swiss SSN AHV number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7164">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7164">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7165">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7165">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7166">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7166">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7167">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7167">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7168">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7168">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7169">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7169">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7170">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7170">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7171">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7171">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7172">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7172">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7173">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7173">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7174">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7174">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7175">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7175">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7176">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7176">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7177">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7177">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7178">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7178">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7179">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7179">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7180">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7180">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7181">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7181">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7182">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7182">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

numéro de sécurité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7202">numéro de sécurité sociale</span></span>

   
## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7203">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7203">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7204">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7204">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7205">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7205">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7206">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7206">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7207">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7207">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7208">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7208">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7209">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7209">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7210">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7210">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7211">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7211">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7212">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7212">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7213">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7213">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7214">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7214">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7215">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7215">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7216">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7216">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7217">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7217">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7218">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7218">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7219">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7219">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7220">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7237">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7237">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7238">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7238">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7239">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7239">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7240">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7240">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7241">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7241">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7242">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7242">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7243">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7243">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7244">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7244">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7245">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7245">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7246">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7246">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7247">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7247">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7248">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7248">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7249">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7249">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7250">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7251">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7251">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7252">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7252">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7253">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7253">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7254">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7254">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7255">ROC passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7255">ROC passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7256">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7256">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7257">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7257">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7258">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7258">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7259">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7259">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7260">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7260">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7261">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7261">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7262">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7262">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7263">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7263">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7264">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7265">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7265">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7266">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7267">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7267">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7268">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7268">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7269">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7269">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7270">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7271">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7271">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7272">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7273">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7273">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7274">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7274">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7275">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7275">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7276">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7276">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7277">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7277">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7278">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7278">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7279">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7279">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7280">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7280">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7281">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7281">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7282">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7282">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7283">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7283">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7284">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7284">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7285">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7285">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7286">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7286">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7287">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7287">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7288">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7288">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7289">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7289">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7290">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7290">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7291">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7291">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7292">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7292">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7293">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7293">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7294">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7294">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7295">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7295">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7296">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7296">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7297">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7297">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7298">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7298">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7299">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7299">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7300">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7300">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7301">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7301">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7302">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7302">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7303">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7303">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7304">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7304">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7305">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7305">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7306">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7306">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7307">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7307">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7308">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7308">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7309">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7309">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7310">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7310">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7311">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7311">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7312">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7312">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7313">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7313">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7314">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7314">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7315">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7315">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7316">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7316">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7317">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7317">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7318">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7318">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7319">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7319">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7320">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7320">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7321">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7321">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7322">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7322">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7323">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7323">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7324">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7324">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7325">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7325">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7326">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7326">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7327">TC Kimlik No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7327">TC Kimlik No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7328">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7328">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7329">Vatandaşlık numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7329">Vatandaşlık numarası</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7330">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7330">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7331">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7331">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7332">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7332">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7333">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7333">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7334">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7334">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7335">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7335">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7336">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7336">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7337">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7337">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7338">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7338">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7339">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7339">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7340">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7340">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7341">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7341">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7342">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7342">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7343">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7343">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7344">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7344">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7345">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7345">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7346">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7346">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7347">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7347">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7348">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7348">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7349">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7349">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7367">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7367">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7368">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7368">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7369">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7369">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7370">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7370">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7371">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7371">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7372">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7372">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7373">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7373">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7374">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7374">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7375">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7375">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7376">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7376">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7377">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7377">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7378">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7378">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7380">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7380">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7385">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7385">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7386">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7386">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7387">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7387">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7388">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7388">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7389">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7389">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7390">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7390">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7391">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7391">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7392">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7392">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7393">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7393">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7394">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7394">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7395">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7395">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7396">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7396">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7397">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7397">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7398">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7398">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7399">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7399">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7400">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7400">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7401">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7401">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7402">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7402">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7403">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7403">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7404">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7404">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7405">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7405">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7406">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7406">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7407">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7407">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>
