#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7417">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7417">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7418">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7418">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7419">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7419">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7420">D. B。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7420">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7421">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7421">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7422">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7422">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7423">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7423">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7424">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7424">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7425">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7425">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7426">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7426">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7427">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7427">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7428">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7428">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7429">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7429">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7430"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7430">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7431">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7431">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7432">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7432">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7433">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7433">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7434">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7434">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7435">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7435">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7436">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7436">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7437">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7437">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7438">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7438">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7439">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7439">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7440">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7440">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7441">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7441">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7442">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7442">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7443">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7443">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7444">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7444">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7445">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7445">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7446">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7446">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7447">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7447">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7448">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7448">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7449">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7449">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7450">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7450">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7451">未找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7451">No keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NINO -->
<Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7473">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7473">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7474">唯一的纳税人参考号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7474">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7475">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7475">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7476">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7476">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7477">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7477">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7478">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7478">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7480">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7480">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7482">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7482">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7483">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7483">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7484">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7484">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7504">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7504">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7505">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7505">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7506">8-17 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7506">8-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7507">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7507">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7508">8-17 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7508">8-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7509">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7510">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7510">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7511">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7512">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7513">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7513">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7514">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7514">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7544">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7544">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7545">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7545">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7546">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7546">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7547">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7547">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7548">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7548">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7549">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7549">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7550">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7550">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7551">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7551">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7552">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7552">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7553">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7553">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7554">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7554">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7555">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7555">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7556">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7556">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7557">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7557">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7558">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7558">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7559">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7559">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7560">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7560">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7561">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7561">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7562">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7562">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7660">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7660">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7661">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7661">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7662">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7662">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7663">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7663">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7664">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7664">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7665">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7665">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7666">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7666">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7667">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7667">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7668">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7668">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7669">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7669">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7670">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7670">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7671">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7671">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7672">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7672">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7673">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7673">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7674">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7674">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7675">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7675">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7676">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7676">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7677">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7677">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7678">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7678">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7679">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7679">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7680">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7680">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7681">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7681">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7682">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7682">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7683">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7683">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7684">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7684">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7685">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7685">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7686">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7686">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7687">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7687">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7688">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7688">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7689">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7689">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7690">找到 Keyword_itin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7690">A keyword from Keyword_itin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7691">函数 Func_us_address 找到正确日期格式的地址。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7691">The function Func_us_address finds an address in the right date format.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7692">函数 Func_us_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7692">The function Func_us_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
<Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_itin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_address" />
          <Match idRef="Func_us_date" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7694">Keyword_itin</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7694">Keyword_itin</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7703">itins</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7703">itins</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7704">taxid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7704">taxid</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7707">许可证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7707">License</span></span>

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7713"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7713">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7714">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7714">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7715">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7715">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7716">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7716">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7717">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7717">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7718">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7718">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7719">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7719">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7720">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7720">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7721">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7721">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7722">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7722">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7723">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7723">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7724">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7724">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7725">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7725">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7726">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7726">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7727">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7727">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7728">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7728">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7729">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7729">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7730">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7730">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7731">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7731">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7732">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7732">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7733">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7733">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7734">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7734">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7735">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7735">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7736">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7736">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7737">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7737">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7738">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7738">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7739">Keyword_ssn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7739">Keyword_ssn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7740">SSA 编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7740">SSA Number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7742">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7742">social security #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7743">社会保障#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7743">social security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7744">社会保障号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7744">social security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7745">Social Security#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7745">Social Security#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7746">Soc Sec</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7746">Soc Sec</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7747">SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7747">SSN</span></span>

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7752">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7752">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7753">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7753">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7754">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7754">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7755">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7755">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7756">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7756">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7757">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7757">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7758">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7758">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7759">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7759">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7760">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7760">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7761">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7761">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7762">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7762">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7763">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7763">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7764">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7764">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7765">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7765">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7766">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7766">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7767">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7767">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7768">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7768">Passport Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7769">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7769">Passport No</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7770">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7770">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7771">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7771">Passport#</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7772">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7772">PassportID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7773">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7773">Passportno</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7774">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7774">passportnumber</span></span>

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7786">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7786">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7787">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7787">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7788">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7788">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7789">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7789">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7790">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7790">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7791">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7791">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7792">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7792">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7793">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7793">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7794">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7794">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7795">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7795">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7796">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7796">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7799">乌克兰护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7799">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7800">护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7800">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7801">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7801">passport no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7802">паспорт України</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7802">паспорт України</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7803">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7803">номер паспорта</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7804">персональний</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7804">персональний</span></span>


## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7805">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7805">Ukraine passport international</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7806">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7806">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7807">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7807">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7808">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7808">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7809">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7809">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7810">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7810">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7811">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7811">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7812">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7812">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7813">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7813">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7814">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7814">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7815">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7815">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7816">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7816">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7817">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7817">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_ukraine_passport_international"></a><span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7819">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7819">Keyword_ukraine_passport_international</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7820">乌克兰护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7820">ukraine passport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7821">护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7821">passport number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7822">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7822">passport no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="b9f63-7824">номер паспорта</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="b9f63-7824">номер паспорта</span></span>
